String.Source: Inspired by the hot springs of Wakamama and Pebbu, Perfect Balance Spa prides itself of masterful massages and tranquil surroundings. Come lose yourself in tranquility. Just don't get too lost, you are charged by the minute.
String.Dest: Inspired by the hot springs of Wakamama and Pebbu, Perfect Balance Spa prides itself of masterful massages and tranquil surroundings. Come lose yourself in tranquility. Just don't get too lost, you are charged by the minute.

String.Source: Landgraab Pictures Presents: Foldy in the Big City. Foldy was a simple chair, but he had big dreams of becoming a big star. He wanted to have pictures on billboards and become a star like all of the other big time chairs. What better place for Foldy to succeed than in the big city!
String.Dest: Landgraab Pictures Presents: Foldy in the Big City. Foldy was a simple chair, but he had big dreams of becoming a big star. He wanted to have pictures on billboards and become a star like all of the other big time chairs. What better place for Foldy to succeed than in the big city!

String.Source: Sims Speed brings you the very best in tire technology! Presenting the SS01: this tire has a superb radial design with the hardcore racer in mind. The tire's compound was designed to provide the very best balance of performance, longevity, traction, and consistency. If you cannot improve your lap times with the SS01, the tire is probably not the issue.
String.Dest: Sims Speed brings you the very best in tire technology! Presenting the SS01: this tire has a superb radial design with the hardcore racer in mind. The tire's compound was designed to provide the very best balance of performance, longevity, traction, and consistency. If you cannot improve your lap times with the SS01, the tire is probably not the issue.

String.Source: Future Sim Labs presents, Inventa Con! Inventa Con will challenge the best and brightest of the world. You will have 48 hours to design and create the invention of your dreams. If you think you have what it takes to be the next Bill Hawkings then sign up TODAY!
String.Dest: Future Sim Labs presents, Inventa Con! Inventa Con will challenge the best and brightest of the world. You will have 48 hours to design and create the invention of your dreams. If you think you have what it takes to be the next Bill Hawkings then sign up TODAY!

String.Source: Diamonds Are For Sims - Rumor has it that MorcuCorp is smuggling national treasures out of Egypt, including the famous pink Diamond of D'nile. Can James Pond infiltrate their headquarters and return this natural treasure to its rightful place in Al Simhara?
String.Dest: Diamonds Are For Sims - Rumor has it that MorcuCorp is smuggling national treasures out of Egypt, including the famous pink Diamond of D'nile. Can James Pond infiltrate their headquarters and return this natural treasure to its rightful place in Al Simhara?

String.Source: Moonlight Massacre III - Five college friends refuse to heed local's warnings as they venture to a remote campsite deep in the woods for a weekend of debauchery. Shaka-bra? More like shaka-buried!
String.Dest: Moonlight Massacre III - Five college friends refuse to heed local's warnings as they venture to a remote campsite deep in the woods for a weekend of debauchery. Shaka-bra? More like shaka-buried!

String.Source: The Khlumzee Sisters - Too many cooks in the kitchen doesn't even begin to describe the situation the Khlumzee Sisters find themselves in. This is one fancy dinner that's gone to the dogs...literally!
String.Dest: The Khlumzee Sisters - Too many cooks in the kitchen doesn't even begin to describe the situation the Khlumzee Sisters find themselves in. This is one fancy dinner that's gone to the dogs...literally!

String.Source: At Oak Thief we pride ourselves on perfection. We carefully hand pick grapes hailing from the furthest regions of your local grocery store. This stimulating fruit has elegant structure, making Oak Thief nectars rich in color, smooth in taste, and full of flavor. Our nectars are the perfect pairing to Chinese Chicken Salad. Oak Thief, at our prices you are practically stealing our nectar!
String.Dest: At Oak Thief we pride ourselves on perfection. We carefully hand pick grapes hailing from the furthest regions of your local grocery store. This stimulating fruit has elegant structure, making Oak Thief nectars rich in color, smooth in taste, and full of flavor. Our nectars are the perfect pairing to Chinese Chicken Salad. Oak Thief, at our prices you are practically stealing our nectar!

String.Source: SuperKids: Cortex Catastrophe - The terrific two-o duo return in SuperKids: Cortex Catastrophe. After years in exile, their arch nemesis, Mind Ove'Matter executes his plan to bring about the end of existence! Can the SuperKids save humanity yet again?
String.Dest: SuperKids: Cortex Catastrophe - The terrific two-o duo return in SuperKids: Cortex Catastrophe. After years in exile, their arch nemesis, Mind Ove'Matter executes his plan to bring about the end of existence! Can the SuperKids save humanity yet again?

String.Source: Tipped a Street Performer with melodic tunes. Not too much, not too little, just enough to not trigger the blues.
String.Dest: Tipped a Street Performer with melodic tunes. Not too much, not too little, just enough to not trigger the blues.

String.Source: The Friendly Lobbyist is someone who builds community and fosters peace within, and without, the movement. Collect Donations from supporters to build momentum!
String.Dest: The Friendly Lobbyist is someone who builds community and fosters peace within, and without, the movement. Collect Donations from supporters to build momentum!

String.Source: The Fundraising Specialist is all about bringing in big bucks for big causes -- your cause, that is! Shake hands, compliment, praise, and smile your way towards those cash donations.
String.Dest: The Fundraising Specialist is all about bringing in big bucks for big causes -- your cause, that is! Shake hands, compliment, praise, and smile your way towards those cash donations.

String.Source: The money is really rolling in now, assuming you're doing your job! The Charity Organizer is focused on adding another 0 to every check signed for the cause.
String.Dest: The money is really rolling in now, assuming you're doing your job! The Charity Organizer is focused on adding another 0 to every check signed for the cause.

String.Source: The Non-Profit Director is truly a charming individual, capable of marshalling the forces of good -- and the benevolent wealthy forces -- for a common cause.
String.Dest: The Non-Profit Director is truly a charming individual, capable of marshalling the forces of good -- and the benevolent wealthy forces -- for a common cause.

String.Source: The Leader of the Cause is the true spokesperson and voice of the cause in which everyone around you believes. There is no truer champion of the good you intend than you.
String.Dest: The Leader of the Cause is the true spokesperson and voice of the cause in which everyone around you believes. There is no truer champion of the good you intend than you.

String.Source: The Charity Icon rests atop a heap of goodwill, charitable donations, and causes solved to bask in the glow of a world better served. Enjoy the feels, because you've earned them.
String.Dest: The Charity Icon rests atop a heap of goodwill, charitable donations, and causes solved to bask in the glow of a world better served. Enjoy the feels, because you've earned them.

String.Source: The Unruly Activist is new to the world of hope, change, and politics, but is not without some tools. Unruly Activists can Pick a Cause, which they can then Promote to others and Protest for on public streets. Donations are key as well, so build a base of supporters and shake hands!
String.Dest: The Unruly Activist is new to the world of hope, change, and politics, but is not without some tools. Unruly Activists can Pick a Cause, which they can then Promote to others and Protest for on public streets. Donations are key as well, so build a base of supporters and shake hands!

String.Source: The Campaign Intern is a very important cog in the political machine, thanks to the ability to Endorse Politics. So, get out there, endorse, and raise more funding for the cause you support!
String.Dest: The Campaign Intern is a very important cog in the political machine, thanks to the ability to Endorse Politics. So, get out there, endorse, and raise more funding for the cause you support!

String.Source: Social Justice Workers are arduous defenders of fairness and equality. That's what your name tag says, at least! Be sure to Check Cause Progress on a computer to see just how far you've moved...or not moved...the needle of change.
String.Dest: Social Justice Workers are arduous defenders of fairness and equality. That's what your name tag says, at least! Be sure to Check Cause Progress on a computer to see just how far you've moved...or not moved...the needle of change.

String.Source: As a Community Organizer it's time for some proper field work...behind a podium! You're now able to Give Speeches behind the podium in the comfort of your own home, or better yet, in the park in front of eager voters!
String.Dest: As a Community Organizer it's time for some proper field work...behind a podium! You're now able to Give Speeches behind the podium in the comfort of your own home, or better yet, in the park in front of eager voters!

String.Source: The Civil Servant is the first step in a true Politician's career. Promote Policies and Secure Votes to succeed and move up the political ladder!
String.Dest: The Civil Servant is the first step in a true Politician's career. Promote Policies and Secure Votes to succeed and move up the political ladder!

String.Source: As a Public Official, securing the vote is more important than ever. Thankfully, you can Make Empty Promises to pair with your policy promotion. It's a 1-2 punch of public service!
String.Dest: As a Public Official, securing the vote is more important than ever. Thankfully, you can Make Empty Promises to pair with your policy promotion. It's a 1-2 punch of public service!

String.Source: The Councilperson is an elected official and must get out among the voters to secure votes, make promises of questionable value, but also, kiss babies! Yes, beautiful babies. Go find some and kiss them for ratings.
String.Dest: The Councilperson is an elected official and must get out among the voters to secure votes, make promises of questionable value, but also, kiss babies! Yes, beautiful babies. Go find some and kiss them for ratings.

String.Source: As a Representative, you're moving up the halls of power. Gaze out upon your field and note that it is flush with progress and good policy. Well done, Representative!
String.Dest: As a Representative, you're moving up the halls of power. Gaze out upon your field and note that it is flush with progress and good policy. Well done, Representative!

String.Source: As an Elder Statesperson, you've been around the block once, twice, heck, even thrice! There's no baby too ugly to kiss, no promise too far fetched to make. You're always beating the pavement for your constituents.
String.Dest: As an Elder Statesperson, you've been around the block once, twice, heck, even thrice! There's no baby too ugly to kiss, no promise too far fetched to make. You're always beating the pavement for your constituents.

String.Source: As the National Leader, you command the respect of countless citizens. You've clearly done something right to garner so many votes. Or, perhaps you just kissed the right baby? Soak it in, you've arrived.
String.Dest: As the National Leader, you command the respect of countless citizens. You've clearly done something right to garner so many votes. Or, perhaps you just kissed the right baby? Soak it in, you've arrived.

String.Source: You've taken the town by storm and are THE authority when it comes to the artistic eye. Sims follow you in droves. Lead them. Lead them to artistic bliss.
String.Dest: You've taken the town by storm and are THE authority when it comes to the artistic eye. Sims follow you in droves. Lead them. Lead them to artistic bliss.

String.Source: You seem to be pretty opinionated. Even when no one asks. Well, why don't you write your thoughts on the arts, performing or painting? Show us how much snoot you can bring to the table.
String.Dest: You seem to be pretty opinionated. Even when no one asks. Well, why don't you write your thoughts on the arts, performing or painting? Show us how much snoot you can bring to the table.

String.Source: We need someone to check out the local performances. Get there, see if they're any good. Whether are or not, we need a 12 page write-up.
String.Dest: We need someone to check out the local performances. Get there, see if they're any good. Whether are or not, we need a 12 page write-up.

String.Source: We love the detail in your work! You've refined your craft, we think you can tackle bigger and better outings. Check out some of the local festivals - there's lots of stuff going on there!
String.Dest: We love the detail in your work! You've refined your craft, we think you can tackle bigger and better outings. Check out some of the local festivals - there's lots of stuff going on there!

String.Source: The city has so much to offer culturally. Check out some of the sites and sounds and jot down your thoughts. Are they authentic experiences? Let the city know!
String.Dest: The city has so much to offer culturally. Check out some of the sites and sounds and jot down your thoughts. Are they authentic experiences? Let the city know!

String.Source: You're a critical hit! Take your experience and eye for the arts and reach new heights. You're almost there, go for glory!
String.Dest: You're a critical hit! Take your experience and eye for the arts and reach new heights. You're almost there, go for glory!

String.Source: Thumbs up or thumbs down? Sims are relying on you to let them know what they should think!
String.Dest: Thumbs up or thumbs down? Sims are relying on you to let them know what they should think!

String.Source: Review Food or Drink, or Write Column ({0.String})
String.Dest: Review Food or Drink, or Write Column ({0.String})

String.Source: Only the finest of the fine for those who follow you and your opinion. Nothing beneath excellence.
String.Dest: Only the finest of the fine for those who follow you and your opinion. Nothing beneath excellence.

String.Source: Let's start simple. I'll make some mac 'n' cheese. You tell me what you think of it. Hint: I'm your boss, so obviously it's excellent. Now give me a five page column why you think it's excellent.
String.Dest: Let's start simple. I'll make some mac 'n' cheese. You tell me what you think of it. Hint: I'm your boss, so obviously it's excellent. Now give me a five page column why you think it's excellent.

String.Source: Alright, friend, you think you know a thing or two about meals? Watch a lot of Cooking Channel, do you? Well the hot newness are the Food Stalls everyone's raving about. Get out there and let the Sims know if these are really "all that" or if they're just over-rated roach coaches.
String.Dest: Alright, friend, you think you know a thing or two about meals? Watch a lot of Cooking Channel, do you? Well the hot newness are the Food Stalls everyone's raving about. Get out there and let the Sims know if these are really "all that" or if they're just over-rated roach coaches.

String.Source: So, you want to be THE name that Sims go to for food recommendations? Get out there and explore new foods, and get out of your comfort zone.
String.Dest: So, you want to be THE name that Sims go to for food recommendations? Get out there and explore new foods, and get out of your comfort zone.

String.Source: I hear the Spice Festival has a bunch of new food that's on fire! Be the expert on the local cuisine. Eat to your heart's content! Because that's what a Gourmand does.
String.Dest: I hear the Spice Festival has a bunch of new food that's on fire! Be the expert on the local cuisine. Eat to your heart's content! Because that's what a Gourmand does.

String.Source: Your taste is more refined. You've come along way since being a Paper Pusher. Use that experience to tell the whole city what you think of the next cool thing. Through columns. More columns.
String.Dest: Your taste is more refined. You've come along way since being a Paper Pusher. Use that experience to tell the whole city what you think of the next cool thing. Through columns. More columns.

String.Source: You've proven to be the expert on all things food. Use your authority to crush those who think they can cook. They'll make shows where you judge food. Sims all around will come to take you down, but show them all who knows what food is!
String.Dest: You've proven to be the expert on all things food. Use your authority to crush those who think they can cook. They'll make shows where you judge food. Sims all around will come to take you down, but show them all who knows what food is!

String.Source: Get those papers from one end of the office to the other! GO!
String.Dest: Get those papers from one end of the office to the other! GO!

String.Source: You've pushed those papers and are now ready to go online and look things up on Simpedia. Practice those key-word searches!
String.Dest: You've pushed those papers and are now ready to go online and look things up on Simpedia. Practice those key-word searches!

String.Source: OK time to focus - we need columns on things that interest Sims. Get out there and show us what you think of the next hot thing!
String.Dest: OK time to focus - we need columns on things that interest Sims. Get out there and show us what you think of the next hot thing!

String.Source: Share Jokes with Followers or Troll teh Forums ({0.String})
String.Dest: Share Jokes with Followers or Troll teh Forums ({0.String})

String.Source: Pictures galore, and it's your job as Simstagram Searcher to go through them all. With your blog, you are constantly sharing images, you are happy to boost the popularity of any Simstagram user that needs more followers.
String.Dest: Pictures galore, and it's your job as Simstagram Searcher to go through them all. With your blog, you are constantly sharing images, you are happy to boost the popularity of any Simstagram user that needs more followers.

String.Source: You are the source for all the cat videos that the internet can handle. The best part? Your work is practically done for you. Cats are an instant win when it comes to the internet and you will take full advantage to boost your name.
String.Dest: You are the source for all the cat videos that the internet can handle. The best part? Your work is practically done for you. Cats are an instant win when it comes to the internet and you will take full advantage to boost your name.

String.Source: Niche Broadcaster? What do you even do? A question you hear all too often, but you've found a group of people that want someone to love the same thing as them and you are that person. Once you have a corner on this market it will be time to take the next step and take on the world!
String.Dest: Niche Broadcaster? What do you even do? A question you hear all too often, but you've found a group of people that want someone to love the same thing as them and you are that person. Once you have a corner on this market it will be time to take the next step and take on the world!

String.Source: Master of the Memes! The Meme Master! And any other catchy names that people want to use for you. You not only spread the memes, you create the jokes that they are fueled by.
String.Dest: Master of the Memes! The Meme Master! And any other catchy names that people want to use for you. You not only spread the memes, you create the jokes that they are fueled by.

String.Source: Your name is everywhere online. People know you by sight, and want to say they know you. It may be mostly on the digital plain, but that doesn't stop you from loving every second of it.
String.Dest: Your name is everywhere online. People know you by sight, and want to say they know you. It may be mostly on the digital plain, but that doesn't stop you from loving every second of it.

String.Source: You are a serial reality show contestant. When they need someone funny, they call on you. You play the funny sweet one, clueless about all the politics going on behind the scenes, but it's worth it when they've underestimated your prowess by the end of the season.
String.Dest: You are a serial reality show contestant. When they need someone funny, they call on you. You play the funny sweet one, clueless about all the politics going on behind the scenes, but it's worth it when they've underestimated your prowess by the end of the season.

String.Source: You aren't just an internet superstar; you are The Internet Superstar. Your name has become synonymous with the internet, and nobody can go anywhere without seeing you. You've done the livestreams, and endorsed the products, you've even spent your time playing the celebrity. There is no question that it has enormous perks, and you can't imagine any other life.
String.Dest: You aren't just an internet superstar; you are The Internet Superstar. Your name has become synonymous with the internet, and nobody can go anywhere without seeing you. You've done the livestreams, and endorsed the products, you've even spent your time playing the celebrity. There is no question that it has enormous perks, and you can't imagine any other life.

String.Source: Everyone has to start somewhere, so here you are in the position of intern which is no better than coffee runner. Your dreams are to make it to the top someday, but in the meantime...who wants coffee?
String.Dest: Everyone has to start somewhere, so here you are in the position of intern which is no better than coffee runner. Your dreams are to make it to the top someday, but in the meantime...who wants coffee?

String.Source: It's your job to make everyone happy, but how you're supposed to do it is your own problem. Each day is filled with endless surveys in an attempt to get the opinions of the people. Unfortunately you have to sift through the classic "AMAZING!" and "This is lame" before you get to the gems that make the job worth it.
String.Dest: It's your job to make everyone happy, but how you're supposed to do it is your own problem. Each day is filled with endless surveys in an attempt to get the opinions of the people. Unfortunately you have to sift through the classic "AMAZING!" and "This is lame" before you get to the gems that make the job worth it.

String.Source: It's your whole job to write articles that bring people to your website. Whether the articles match their titles or not isn't your problem. The more incensed the readers are the better.
String.Dest: It's your whole job to write articles that bring people to your website. Whether the articles match their titles or not isn't your problem. The more incensed the readers are the better.

String.Source: You are all about keeping up the relationship with the customers. Public Relations Coordinator duties range from talking with customers through social networks to creating events for them.
String.Dest: You are all about keeping up the relationship with the customers. Public Relations Coordinator duties range from talking with customers through social networks to creating events for them.

String.Source: The job with the most stress and the least gratitude. You are the front face for your company, the one who deals with all the love and hate with each announcement that comes out. Sometimes you are their friend, sometimes not so much. Once in a while you'll get those beautiful shining days where everything is right, before they devolve into madness.
String.Dest: The job with the most stress and the least gratitude. You are the front face for your company, the one who deals with all the love and hate with each announcement that comes out. Sometimes you are their friend, sometimes not so much. Once in a while you'll get those beautiful shining days where everything is right, before they devolve into madness.

String.Source: You're the key contact for anything with the press. Interviews are in your hands, and it's up to you to deal with the crazy demands of the celebrities. You won't go insane until you're finished picking out the pink candies from a third bag, but some have been known to loose it after two bags.
String.Dest: You're the key contact for anything with the press. Interviews are in your hands, and it's up to you to deal with the crazy demands of the celebrities. You won't go insane until you're finished picking out the pink candies from a third bag, but some have been known to loose it after two bags.

String.Source: As Account Executive you now have a whole brand to yourself. Who gets information about company news is in your hands. You cultivate the best target audience and drop news articles likes seeds on a trail to your product.
String.Dest: As Account Executive you now have a whole brand to yourself. Who gets information about company news is in your hands. You cultivate the best target audience and drop news articles likes seeds on a trail to your product.

String.Source: You control the conversations that involve your company. Their reputation is completely in your hands, so...try not to mess it up.
String.Dest: You control the conversations that involve your company. Their reputation is completely in your hands, so...try not to mess it up.

String.Source: You're the VP, so now you make all the money with none of the work. Okay, okay, so you do have some responsibilities, including building relationships for your brand and supporting the company's vision, but who wants to mess with the VP stereotype.
String.Dest: You're the VP, so now you make all the money with none of the work. Okay, okay, so you do have some responsibilities, including building relationships for your brand and supporting the company's vision, but who wants to mess with the VP stereotype.

String.Source: When it comes to turning everything to your side you are the best. You can take any bad piece of news and make your clients look good. It's all within your control.
String.Dest: When it comes to turning everything to your side you are the best. You can take any bad piece of news and make your clients look good. It's all within your control.

String.Source: Join a life of public service! From protesting against the unjust, to gathering donations for good causes, or even collecting the occasional bribe as a "means to an end", Politics is always interesting.
String.Dest: Join a life of public service! From protesting against the unjust, to gathering donations for good causes, or even collecting the occasional bribe as a "means to an end", Politics is always interesting.

String.Source: Secure votes, give speeches, and become the National Leader! Better brush up on your public policy!
String.Dest: Secure votes, give speeches, and become the National Leader! Better brush up on your public policy!

String.Source: Use your political prowess for the greater good. Raise money and fund a solution for the Cause you support!
String.Dest: Use your political prowess for the greater good. Raise money and fund a solution for the Cause you support!

String.Source: What’s trending? Where’s the best food in town? Who’s the most interesting celebrity? Start a career in Social Media to be the person that answers these questions for their followers. Blog and check-in at venues to keep followers coming back for more.
String.Dest: What’s trending? Where’s the best food in town? Who’s the most interesting celebrity? Start a career in Social Media to be the person that answers these questions for their followers. Blog and check-in at venues to keep followers coming back for more.

String.Source: Internet fame can be for anyone. Continue to build your army of followers through pranks and jokes, all while working towards complete internet stardom!
String.Dest: Internet fame can be for anyone. Continue to build your army of followers through pranks and jokes, all while working towards complete internet stardom!

String.Source: Going corporate is not always a bad thing, it gives a view to the highest level of celebrities and publicizing large products. Convincing people to show off is one of your best skills. There is nothing too big for you to spin in your favor.
String.Dest: Going corporate is not always a bad thing, it gives a view to the highest level of celebrities and publicizing large products. Convincing people to show off is one of your best skills. There is nothing too big for you to spin in your favor.

String.Source: Set the standard for all artistic endeavors.
String.Dest: Set the standard for all artistic endeavors.

String.Source: Everyone has an opinion. But not everyone is paid to have it! Sims who feel they have superior judgement can enter the Critic Career. Whether it’s the foods or the arts, your Sim will have something to say about it, and others WILL listen.
String.Dest: Everyone has an opinion. But not everyone is paid to have it! Sims who feel they have superior judgement can enter the Critic Career. Whether it’s the foods or the arts, your Sim will have something to say about it, and others WILL listen.

String.Source: If you don't love it, they won't eat it.
String.Dest: If you don't love it, they won't eat it.

String.Source: Write a blog post about it.
String.Dest: Write a blog post about it.

String.Source: Be the change I want to see.
String.Dest: Be the change I want to see.

String.Source: The song I like just came on the radio!
String.Dest: The song I like just came on the radio!

String.Source: Someone is wrong on the internet. What do I do?
String.Dest: Someone is wrong on the internet. What do I do?

String.Source: The best part of having an opinion is...
String.Dest: The best part of having an opinion is...

String.Source: I've found a worthy cause to support. How should I help?
String.Dest: I've found a worthy cause to support. How should I help?

String.Source: Since Sims share walls with their neighbors, Apartments have some limitations compared to Residential Homes. Exterior walls and windows can't be modified, and you can't add floors or basements.
String.Dest: Since Sims share walls with their neighbors, Apartments have some limitations compared to Residential Homes. Exterior walls and windows can't be modified, and you can't add floors or basements.

String.Source: However, once you move into a Penthouse you don't have to deal with a landlord or units next door. You are able to personalize and design you own space. Exterior walls are adjustable, and you can add floors, as well as pools to the ground floor.
String.Dest: However, once you move into a Penthouse you don't have to deal with a landlord or units next door. You are able to personalize and design you own space. Exterior walls are adjustable, and you can add floors, as well as pools to the ground floor.

String.Source: While it may not be the most eye catching piece in your apartment, this pillar gives you the ability to open up your space without losing structural integrity.
String.Dest: While it may not be the most eye catching piece in your apartment, this pillar gives you the ability to open up your space without losing structural integrity.

String.Source: The front entryway is always a challenge to illuminate. Why use boring lights when you can spice things up with the Illuminating Pillar? With various color options, one is sure to find the color that will light up the night.
String.Dest: The front entryway is always a challenge to illuminate. Why use boring lights when you can spice things up with the Illuminating Pillar? With various color options, one is sure to find the color that will light up the night.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName}, there's a world famous circus in the city; tonight only! Let's go check it out!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName}, there's a world famous circus in the city; tonight only! Let's go check it out!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName}... I just found out about this concert at an abandoned warehouse. We can't miss this; let's go!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName}... I just found out about this concert at an abandoned warehouse. We can't miss this; let's go!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName}, I just won two tickets to the San Myshuno Theater's sold out show! Want to go with me?
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName}, I just won two tickets to the San Myshuno Theater's sold out show! Want to go with me?

String.Source: Hey {0.SimFirstName}, it's {1.SimFirstName}. I'm going to go to that bar you recommended. Wanna come with?
String.Dest: Hey {0.SimFirstName}, it's {1.SimFirstName}. I'm going to go to that bar you recommended. Wanna come with?

String.Source: Hey {0.SimFirstName}, it's {1.SimFirstName}. I'm going to go to that Nightclub you recommended. Do you want to join?
String.Dest: Hey {0.SimFirstName}, it's {1.SimFirstName}. I'm going to go to that Nightclub you recommended. Do you want to join?

String.Source: Hey {0.SimFirstName}, it's {1.SimFirstName}. I'm going to go to that museum you were talking about. Do you want to join?
String.Dest: Hey {0.SimFirstName}, it's {1.SimFirstName}. I'm going to go to that museum you were talking about. Do you want to join?

String.Source: Hey {0.SimFirstName}, it's {1.SimFirstName}. I'm going to go to check out that restaurant you mentioned. You down to come out?
String.Dest: Hey {0.SimFirstName}, it's {1.SimFirstName}. I'm going to go to check out that restaurant you mentioned. You down to come out?

String.Source: The Romance Festival is in town! Click on any of the Dynamic Signs around town to find out more!
String.Dest: The Romance Festival is in town! Click on any of the Dynamic Signs around town to find out more!

String.Source: Ask the Romance Guru any and all of your burning love questions, but be warned, the Guru can be brutally honest.
String.Dest: Ask the Romance Guru any and all of your burning love questions, but be warned, the Guru can be brutally honest.

String.Source: Grab a cup of delicious Sakura tea to put you in the perfect mood to mingle.
String.Dest: Grab a cup of delicious Sakura tea to put you in the perfect mood to mingle.

String.Source: The Romance Festival is the perfect place to seal the deal. We even have a wedding arch on site for that heat of the moment marriage.
String.Dest: The Romance Festival is the perfect place to seal the deal. We even have a wedding arch on site for that heat of the moment marriage.

String.Source: Celebrate the Romance Festival by scattering petals in the air. Fun for children and adults!
String.Dest: Celebrate the Romance Festival by scattering petals in the air. Fun for children and adults!

String.Source: Talk to any of the local vendors. You will be able to trade your collectibles with them for a chance at better ones.
String.Dest: Talk to any of the local vendors. You will be able to trade your collectibles with them for a chance at better ones.

String.Source: Keep an eye out for unique furniture. One Sim's trash is another Sim's treasure. Make sure to always haggle to get the best prices.
String.Dest: Keep an eye out for unique furniture. One Sim's trash is another Sim's treasure. Make sure to always haggle to get the best prices.

String.Source: Keep an eye out for Boxes of Junk laying around. You can rummage through these to find unique collectibles that are only found in the city.
String.Dest: Keep an eye out for Boxes of Junk laying around. You can rummage through these to find unique collectibles that are only found in the city.

String.Source: Visit one of the many display tables to put your own treasures up for sale.
String.Dest: Visit one of the many display tables to put your own treasures up for sale.

String.Source: The Flea Market is in town! Click on any of the Dynamic Signs around town to find out more!
String.Dest: The Flea Market is in town! Click on any of the Dynamic Signs around town to find out more!

String.Source: The Spice Festival is in town! Click on any of the Dynamic Signs around town to find out more!
String.Dest: The Spice Festival is in town! Click on any of the Dynamic Signs around town to find out more!

String.Source: Purchase special spices from the Swag Stall. These spices are sure to make any dish excellent and spicy!
String.Dest: Purchase special spices from the Swag Stall. These spices are sure to make any dish excellent and spicy!

String.Source: Sample an assortment of cultural foods. From curry to burritos, you are sure to find something that suits your taste buds.
String.Dest: Sample an assortment of cultural foods. From curry to burritos, you are sure to find something that suits your taste buds.

String.Source: Are your taste buds up for the challenge? Can you make it to the bottom of the world's spiciest bowl of curry?
String.Dest: Are your taste buds up for the challenge? Can you make it to the bottom of the world's spiciest bowl of curry?

String.Source: Harvest fresh fruits and vegetables from the garden. Sometimes you may even find something out of this world.
String.Dest: Harvest fresh fruits and vegetables from the garden. Sometimes you may even find something out of this world.

String.Source: Travel to Humor and Hijinks Festival
String.Dest: Travel to Humor and Hijinks Festival

String.Source: The Humor and Hijinks Festival is in town! Click on any of the Dynamic Signs around town to find out more!
String.Dest: The Humor and Hijinks Festival is in town! Click on any of the Dynamic Signs around town to find out more!

String.Source: Purchase a Voodoo Doll from the swag stall, and perform voodoo and mischief interactions to earn points for the Pranksters.
String.Dest: Purchase a Voodoo Doll from the swag stall, and perform voodoo and mischief interactions to earn points for the Pranksters.

String.Source: Are you a creature of mischief or comedy? Choose your side by indulging in the Light or the Dark tea. May the best side win!
String.Dest: Are you a creature of mischief or comedy? Choose your side by indulging in the Light or the Dark tea. May the best side win!

String.Source: Make the masses laugh by performing your best comedy routines. Comedy interactions will earn you points for the Jokesters.
String.Dest: Make the masses laugh by performing your best comedy routines. Comedy interactions will earn you points for the Jokesters.

String.Dest: Want to come hangout at my place?

String.Source: I hear the vibe at the Romance Festival is pretty cool. Do you want to come check it out with me?
String.Dest: I hear the vibe at the Romance Festival is pretty cool. Do you want to come check it out with me?

String.Dest: My neighbor says one kiss at the Romance Festival is worth ten anywhere else. Something about the vibe she says... Shall we find out if she's right?

String.Dest: I kind of want to go to the Romance Festival, but not on my own. Will you be my wingman?

String.Dest: My neighbor says the Romance Festival is a great place to meet people. Want to see if he's telling the truth?

String.Dest: Hey, I met this person online and they want to meet me at the Romance Festival. Will you come with me in case they turn out to be a crazy person?

String.Dest: Have you heard? Painting paintings at the Romance Festivals is the in thing right now. Want to try it out?

String.Dest: I heard that throwing petals at the Romance Festival brings good luck. Want to find out if it's true?

String.Source: Let's go to the Flea Market and see if we can find any rare "treasures," and by that I mean awesome junk!
String.Dest: Let's go to the Flea Market and see if we can find any rare "treasures," and by that I mean awesome junk!

String.Dest: Hey, you've got pretty good taste. Will you come to the Flea Market and help me shop for something to brighten up my place?

String.Dest: I hear you're not too good at haggling. Why don't you let me take you to the Flea Market and show you how a pro gets a great price?

String.Dest: I read online about this performer that plays at the Flea Market. Apparently they're the next big thing. Want to come see if it's true?

String.Dest: I hear they have one of those Bubble Blowers at the Spice Festival. Do you want to come with me and try it out?

String.Source: So... the Spice Festival is on. You just have to come with me! It's the only place to buy really fresh ingredients. It'll change your life!
String.Dest: So... the Spice Festival is on. You just have to come with me! It's the only place to buy really fresh ingredients. It'll change your life!

String.Source: I hear you love a bargain. If you want I can show you where to buy cheap ingredients at the Spice Festival...
String.Dest: I hear you love a bargain. If you want I can show you where to buy cheap ingredients at the Spice Festival...

String.Dest: If you want to know about the best food in the city, the vendors at the Spice Festival can tell you all the ins and outs of local Cuisine. You want to come with me to get the inside scoop?

String.Dest: This is a big foodie city. If you want to fit in, you should go to the Spice Festival and learn about local cuisine from the vendors there. They'll tell you the right things to say.

String.Dest: My neighbor swears the food at the Humor and Hijinks Festival is to die for. You want to come see if he's right or not?

String.Dest: Humor and Hijinks Festival is the best. I'd love to take you there, the fireworks alone are amazing!

String.Dest: Let's go to GeekCon and show off our gaming skills. They have a few motion gaming mats that are begging for some new high scores.

String.Source: Well, it's been a long day. I'm going to grab a drink- you want to come with me?
String.Dest: Well, it's been a long day. I'm going to grab a drink- you want to come with me?

String.Dest: I have been dying to work out. I missed leg day last week and everyone knows you never skip leg day. I can totally use a spotter.

String.Dest: It has been super crazy the past few days. I was heading down to the park to relax. Do you want to tag along?

String.Source: Sometimes I just want to get out of the streets and go somewhere green. You want to come to the Park with me?
String.Dest: Sometimes I just want to get out of the streets and go somewhere green. You want to come to the Park with me?

String.Source: A beautiful tiled fence that adds division, color and tranquility.
String.Dest: A beautiful tiled fence that adds division, color and tranquility.

String.Source: With a metal trim and stylish wood panels, this fence is the perfect fit for a modern garden.
String.Dest: With a metal trim and stylish wood panels, this fence is the perfect fit for a modern garden.

String.Source: Walls are often divisive things, splitting one thing from another, be it A versus B, or You versus Me. The Walled Up Together was designed philosophically with a new outlook, which is one of inclusiveness, not divisiveness. When this wall is built, it’s done so with the ideals of bringing people closer together, with an enclosure of love. Walled Up Together – When you’re stuck together, you might as well make the most of it.
String.Dest: Walls are often divisive things, splitting one thing from another, be it A versus B, or You versus Me. The Walled Up Together was designed philosophically with a new outlook, which is one of inclusiveness, not divisiveness. When this wall is built, it’s done so with the ideals of bringing people closer together, with an enclosure of love. Walled Up Together – When you’re stuck together, you might as well make the most of it.

String.Source: Fences are a dime a dozen, though they rarely cost mere dimes. Be they concrete, or brick, or iron and brass, most fences serve a functional purpose that is often well distanced from form. The Refined Divide seeks to stand out, while splitting apart, with its chic, modern textures and novel approach to splitting people, things, and geography in twain.
String.Dest: Fences are a dime a dozen, though they rarely cost mere dimes. Be they concrete, or brick, or iron and brass, most fences serve a functional purpose that is often well distanced from form. The Refined Divide seeks to stand out, while splitting apart, with its chic, modern textures and novel approach to splitting people, things, and geography in twain.

String.Source: Simple, unadorned, but reliable and dependable foundation for your home!
String.Dest: Simple, unadorned, but reliable and dependable foundation for your home!

String.Source: Not your everyday basketball. This basketball is crafted from the finest leathers from far away lands. No matter how fine the leather is it will not make your game any better.
String.Dest: Not your everyday basketball. This basketball is crafted from the finest leathers from far away lands. No matter how fine the leather is it will not make your game any better.

String.Source: If you are having trouble remembering where a 2, 3, or free throw is, this is the perfect court outline for you. Coming in all sorts of colors and sizes you are guaranteed to have the most authentic experience with this Basketball Court outline.
String.Dest: If you are having trouble remembering where a 2, 3, or free throw is, this is the perfect court outline for you. Coming in all sorts of colors and sizes you are guaranteed to have the most authentic experience with this Basketball Court outline.

String.Source: Tight on space? Not enough room for a full court? The Basketball Court Key is exactly what you need.
String.Dest: Tight on space? Not enough room for a full court? The Basketball Court Key is exactly what you need.

String.Source: The Super Shot Basketball Hoop is the perfect way to improve your Sim's fitness. Challenge your neighbors to a game of hoops and demonstrate your athletic prowess. Show the neighborhood that this is your house and you run it!
String.Dest: The Super Shot Basketball Hoop is the perfect way to improve your Sim's fitness. Challenge your neighbors to a game of hoops and demonstrate your athletic prowess. Show the neighborhood that this is your house and you run it!

String.Source: Perfect for any living room or kids' room. If you are running low on space, the Super Shot Wall Hoop will allow you to practice your basketball game while in the comfort of your own home.
String.Dest: Perfect for any living room or kids' room. If you are running low on space, the Super Shot Wall Hoop will allow you to practice your basketball game while in the comfort of your own home.

String.Source: There is nothing better than relieving yourself in your own private restroom, however when you need to go you need to go.
String.Dest: There is nothing better than relieving yourself in your own private restroom, however when you need to go you need to go.

String.Source: Simple yet comfortable, with curves like a porcelain goddess. This sleek bathtub is sure to give you the perfect clean, as if Mount Olympus had a deep snowfall and its naturally thawing ice turned into brisk, refreshing, cleansing water.
String.Dest: Simple yet comfortable, with curves like a porcelain goddess. This sleek bathtub is sure to give you the perfect clean, as if Mount Olympus had a deep snowfall and its naturally thawing ice turned into brisk, refreshing, cleansing water.

String.Source: Rest in approved segmented pieces of time with this luxurious bed made from the finest silk. No worms were harmed in the harvesting of the silk, and their output was both sustainable and artisanal. Sure.
String.Dest: Rest in approved segmented pieces of time with this luxurious bed made from the finest silk. No worms were harmed in the harvesting of the silk, and their output was both sustainable and artisanal. Sure.

String.Source: Spacious and comfortable. This double futon even has a farm fresh, ranch style headboard. You can even smell the residual scent of cattle. Don’t worry, it grows on you.
String.Dest: Spacious and comfortable. This double futon even has a farm fresh, ranch style headboard. You can even smell the residual scent of cattle. Don’t worry, it grows on you.

String.Source: Almost like new, we swear! Still retaining its farm fresh headboard feel. This futon might look a little worn around the edges, but will suit your sleeping needs.
String.Dest: Almost like new, we swear! Still retaining its farm fresh headboard feel. This futon might look a little worn around the edges, but will suit your sleeping needs.

String.Source: With an abstract pattern and vibrant colors this single bed will keep your Sims warm and toasty through the night. The patented space blanket on this bed is woven from the rarest elements Sixam can provide.
String.Dest: With an abstract pattern and vibrant colors this single bed will keep your Sims warm and toasty through the night. The patented space blanket on this bed is woven from the rarest elements Sixam can provide.

String.Source: Subtle accents and a clean design - what better place to store your collection of books. Don't forget to leave the bottom door cracked open for the mice, though. Don't worry; they're so quiet that you'll never know they're there.
String.Dest: Subtle accents and a clean design - what better place to store your collection of books. Don't forget to leave the bottom door cracked open for the mice, though. Don't worry; they're so quiet that you'll never know they're there.

String.Source: This modern bookshelf is sure to puzzle even the most brilliant of minds. Try not to stare or you might get lost in its complexity.
String.Dest: This modern bookshelf is sure to puzzle even the most brilliant of minds. Try not to stare or you might get lost in its complexity.

String.Source: Ride the swell far out, but do not be a shubie, brah. If you need a place to store your collections, books, and beachside chotchkies, look no further than the Rip Tide Shelf.
String.Dest: Ride the swell far out, but do not be a shubie, brah. If you need a place to store your collections, books, and beachside chotchkies, look no further than the Rip Tide Shelf.

String.Source:
The Bubbletron 5000 is the perfect way to sit down and unwind after a hard day at the office. There are flavors galore, that will make this hi-tech marvel a staple in any household. Inhaling bubbles is not recommended.
Living Chairs not Included.
String.Dest:
The Bubbletron 5000 is the perfect way to sit down and unwind after a hard day at the office. There are flavors galore, that will make this hi-tech marvel a staple in any household. Inhaling bubbles is not recommended.
Living Chairs not Included.

String.Source:
This mythical and long sought after Bubble Machina becomes a beautiful centerpiece for any home. With a variety of flavors at hand, Sims can enjoy a range of emotions while using the Bubble Machina.
Living Chairs are required to use the Bubble Machina.
String.Dest:
This mythical and long sought after Bubble Machina becomes a beautiful centerpiece for any home. With a variety of flavors at hand, Sims can enjoy a range of emotions while using the Bubble Machina.
Living Chairs are required to use the Bubble Machina.

String.Source: One of the more common posters by the mysterious local artist, Angsty. Here the anonymous painter taunts the public with a possible hint of their real identity.
String.Dest: One of the more common posters by the mysterious local artist, Angsty. Here the anonymous painter taunts the public with a possible hint of their real identity.

String.Source: This highly collectible poster by rebel artist Angsty is a searing critique of the elite inhabitants of Uptown. Plus, lemonade!
String.Dest: This highly collectible poster by rebel artist Angsty is a searing critique of the elite inhabitants of Uptown. Plus, lemonade!

String.Source: This book advert for a pulpy novel set against the backdrop of the Humor and Hijinks Festival is supposedly one of Angsty's commercial works.
String.Dest: This book advert for a pulpy novel set against the backdrop of the Humor and Hijinks Festival is supposedly one of Angsty's commercial works.

String.Source: This witty political poster for Llama Rights is a classic example of local artist Angsty's unusual style.
String.Dest: This witty political poster for Llama Rights is a classic example of local artist Angsty's unusual style.

String.Source: Created by anonymous guerilla artist Angsty, this work is famed for its use of actual syrup in the printing inks- and its tendency to attract wasps...
String.Dest: Created by anonymous guerilla artist Angsty, this work is famed for its use of actual syrup in the printing inks- and its tendency to attract wasps...

String.Source: 'Every Pancake Tells A Lie' by Angsty
String.Dest: 'Every Pancake Tells A Lie' by Angsty

String.Source: Anonymous artist Angsty created this poster to protest the planned closure of the Stargarden Observatory. After public outcry, the closure was cancelled.
String.Dest: Anonymous artist Angsty created this poster to protest the planned closure of the Stargarden Observatory. After public outcry, the closure was cancelled.

String.Source: The intricate ink work on this poster famously caused it to be delivered after the date of the protest it was supposed to advertise. Guerilla artist Angsty posted hundreds around the city anyway- much to the delight of collectors.
String.Dest: The intricate ink work on this poster famously caused it to be delivered after the date of the protest it was supposed to advertise. Guerilla artist Angsty posted hundreds around the city anyway- much to the delight of collectors.

String.Source: This classic advert is said to be one of guerilla artist Angsty's commercial works.
String.Dest: This classic advert is said to be one of guerilla artist Angsty's commercial works.

String.Source: The use of blacks and whites in this poster is really eye-catching. But the real question is - is that a face, or a silhouette of someone running? Art. You'll never know.
String.Dest: The use of blacks and whites in this poster is really eye-catching. But the real question is - is that a face, or a silhouette of someone running? Art. You'll never know.

String.Source: By day a commercial poster designer, by night an iconoclastic rebel, local artist Angsty is said to have created this travel poster as part of his day job.
String.Dest: By day a commercial poster designer, by night an iconoclastic rebel, local artist Angsty is said to have created this travel poster as part of his day job.

String.Source: This highly collectible poster for an indie horror flick is attributed to mysterious local artist, Angsty.
String.Dest: This highly collectible poster for an indie horror flick is attributed to mysterious local artist, Angsty.

String.Source: Based on the view of the night sky from the Stargarden Observatory, this poster is said to have been designed by Angsty in the throws of an unrequited crush.
String.Dest: Based on the view of the night sky from the Stargarden Observatory, this poster is said to have been designed by Angsty in the throws of an unrequited crush.

String.Source: Reportedly one of local artist Angsty's commercial works, this advert is for a perfume themed around the smell of heart break as a lover walks away. And also roses.
String.Dest: Reportedly one of local artist Angsty's commercial works, this advert is for a perfume themed around the smell of heart break as a lover walks away. And also roses.

String.Source: The creators of this low budget horror film managed to persuade local artist Angsty to make a poster for their Arts Quarter launch party. Unusual, and highly collectible!
String.Dest: The creators of this low budget horror film managed to persuade local artist Angsty to make a poster for their Arts Quarter launch party. Unusual, and highly collectible!

String.Source: Serious collectors of Angsty's work believe that this album poster was designed by the anonymous artist as payment on overdue rent.
String.Dest: Serious collectors of Angsty's work believe that this album poster was designed by the anonymous artist as payment on overdue rent.

String.Source:
The Newcrest Snow Globe features the iconic pink willow tree indigenous to this suburban neighborhood. Folks all around town gather under the tree to catch some shade or take pictures with this cotton candy-like vegetation. Except this one is trapped in a miniature sphere.
The Newcrest Snow Globe is featured at the Romance Festival.
String.Dest:
The Newcrest Snow Globe features the iconic pink willow tree indigenous to this suburban neighborhood. Folks all around town gather under the tree to catch some shade or take pictures with this cotton candy-like vegetation. Except this one is trapped in a miniature sphere.
The Newcrest Snow Globe is featured at the Romance Festival.

String.Source:
The City Skyscraper Snow Globe displays one of the iconic skyscrapers that adorns this city. Its beauty is captured by the radiant lights, illuminating the architecture of Uptown's proud monument.
The City Skyscraper Snow Globe is featured at the Humor and Hijinks Festival.
String.Dest:
The City Skyscraper Snow Globe displays one of the iconic skyscrapers that adorns this city. Its beauty is captured by the radiant lights, illuminating the architecture of Uptown's proud monument.
The City Skyscraper Snow Globe is featured at the Humor and Hijinks Festival.

String.Source: Stanley the Jackalope is said to watch over Granite Falls. In the still of the night, Stanley would watch over nearby campers, ensuring bears steer clear of Sims enjoying nature's beauty. Well, except for Sims in bear suits. He can't do anything about those nerds, unfortunately.
String.Dest: Stanley the Jackalope is said to watch over Granite Falls. In the still of the night, Stanley would watch over nearby campers, ensuring bears steer clear of Sims enjoying nature's beauty. Well, except for Sims in bear suits. He can't do anything about those nerds, unfortunately.

String.Source: The Magnolia Steamboat runs along the river down Magnolia Promenade. The boat stops frequently so Sims can tour the numerous retail shops and take in the scenery.
String.Dest: The Magnolia Steamboat runs along the river down Magnolia Promenade. The boat stops frequently so Sims can tour the numerous retail shops and take in the scenery.

String.Source: The Limited Edition Plumbob Snow Globe contains a rare plumbob, forged from the heart of the planet. The green plumbob spiritually represents control over one's Sim-self, fulfillment of one's whims and aspirations. Encapsulated in this beautiful, gold snow globe, this exquisite piece is a keeper for any real collector.
String.Dest: The Limited Edition Plumbob Snow Globe contains a rare plumbob, forged from the heart of the planet. The green plumbob spiritually represents control over one's Sim-self, fulfillment of one's whims and aspirations. Encapsulated in this beautiful, gold snow globe, this exquisite piece is a keeper for any real collector.

String.Source: The Limited Edition Reaper Snow Globe is absolutely to die for. It's so rare, many Sims would kill for it. If you're ever lucky enough to find one, reap the rewards and hold on to this one-of-a-kind collectible!
String.Dest: The Limited Edition Reaper Snow Globe is absolutely to die for. It's so rare, many Sims would kill for it. If you're ever lucky enough to find one, reap the rewards and hold on to this one-of-a-kind collectible!

String.Source: The Limited Edition Age of the Dinosaur Snow Globe is as rare as finding an actual dinosaur fossil! Depicted here is one of the great beasts in its final moments. Once you grab a hold of this highly collectible globe, don't let it go extinct!
String.Dest: The Limited Edition Age of the Dinosaur Snow Globe is as rare as finding an actual dinosaur fossil! Depicted here is one of the great beasts in its final moments. Once you grab a hold of this highly collectible globe, don't let it go extinct!

String.Source: Age of the Dinosaur Snow Globe (Limited Edition)
String.Dest: Age of the Dinosaur Snow Globe (Limited Edition)

String.Source: Crossing the bridge to get to the city has never been more miniature! Instead of spending time in the slow, torturous traffic, just dream about it as you gaze into the headlights crossing the bridge. Then promptly smash the little bridge into thousands of pieces.
String.Dest: Crossing the bridge to get to the city has never been more miniature! Instead of spending time in the slow, torturous traffic, just dream about it as you gaze into the headlights crossing the bridge. Then promptly smash the little bridge into thousands of pieces.

String.Source: The City Skyline Snow Globe features the bustling city's towering buildings. At this size, the scope can be realized in a way that's just too big in real life. Breathe it in and adore its beauty.
String.Dest: The City Skyline Snow Globe features the bustling city's towering buildings. At this size, the scope can be realized in a way that's just too big in real life. Breathe it in and adore its beauty.

String.Source: The Tudor House represents the charm of Windenburg - quaint, simple living. Living abroad can be quite different from living in the city. Cherish this small memento as the life you wish you had.
String.Dest: The Tudor House represents the charm of Windenburg - quaint, simple living. Living abroad can be quite different from living in the city. Cherish this small memento as the life you wish you had.

String.Source: While the Haunted Mansion has some similarities to the Goth House in Willow Creek, it's not based on their house. The Goths are actually really sweet and quite alive. Well, until they die. Then the similarities are purely coincidental.
String.Dest: While the Haunted Mansion has some similarities to the Goth House in Willow Creek, it's not based on their house. The Goths are actually really sweet and quite alive. Well, until they die. Then the similarities are purely coincidental.

String.Source: A lovely depiction of Yuma Heights in miniature form! Reminisce of simpler times and create new memories as you look fondly at this globe in your collection.
String.Dest: A lovely depiction of Yuma Heights in miniature form! Reminisce of simpler times and create new memories as you look fondly at this globe in your collection.

String.Source: The Willow Creek Lighthouse has been a beacon for ships passing through transporting goods into the small harbor. While the lighthouse hasn't been lit for 34 years, the light has been captured in this tiny, memorable snow globe.
String.Dest: The Willow Creek Lighthouse has been a beacon for ships passing through transporting goods into the small harbor. While the lighthouse hasn't been lit for 34 years, the light has been captured in this tiny, memorable snow globe.

String.Source:
Freezer Bunnies are notorious for being cold and cute. This one, trapped in a globe, is no different. It is a snow globe, after all.
The Freezer Bunny Snow Globe is featured at the Spice Festival.
String.Dest:

String.Source:
Emily has been around for hundreds of years, lurking the waters of Windenburg. She emerges every 52 years to greet the citizens of the city, but she's usually met with fright, horror, and disgust. So she submerges back to the depths of the sea to build up the courage to face those who may one day accept her presence in the land from over the pond.
The Emily Snow Globe is featured at the GeekCon.
String.Dest:

String.Source: This green root is grown in mountain streams. Many have gone to great lengths to replicate its hot flavor. Most wasabi products in the stores are fake. Many think wasabi is the nostril burning paste served with sushi, however, almost always it is a concoction of horseradish, mustard, and green coloring.

String.Source: With five sides and five powerful core processors, the UnorthoBox dares to question the very definition of a box. “What even is a box?” our designers asked. “How can we make a box that laughs in the rectangular faces of all the other boxes? A box that offers the ultimate gaming experience for gamers of all ages and play-styles?” By making it more fun to look at, of course!
String.Dest: With five sides and five powerful core processors, the UnorthoBox dares to question the very definition of a box. “What even is a box?” our designers asked. “How can we make a box that laughs in the rectangular faces of all the other boxes? A box that offers the ultimate gaming experience for gamers of all ages and play-styles?” By making it more fun to look at, of course!

String.Source: The future of gaming has arrived, and isn’t it exhausting? Virtual Reality. Motion Controls. Who’s got the energy for all that? The GoldiBox remembers a happier time, when a stressed-out Sim could sit back, relax, and play some state-of-the-art videogames with a simple gamepad. The GoldiBox. Not too old-fashioned. Not too innovative. Just right.
String.Dest: The future of gaming has arrived, and isn’t it exhausting? Virtual Reality. Motion Controls. Who’s got the energy for all that? The GoldiBox remembers a happier time, when a stressed-out Sim could sit back, relax, and play some state-of-the-art videogames with a simple gamepad. The GoldiBox. Not too old-fashioned. Not too innovative. Just right.

String.Dest: Eight lucky lights, one for each day of the week! No? A week doesn't have 8 days? Really?

String.Source: These lamps provide proper illumination for wandering the streets in the wee hours of the morning.
String.Dest: These lamps provide proper illumination for wandering the streets in the wee hours of the morning.

String.Source: These signs, when paired with the Three Point Street Lamp, provide proper direction for wandering the streets in the late hours of the evening.
String.Dest: These signs, when paired with the Three Point Street Lamp, provide proper direction for wandering the streets in the late hours of the evening.

String.Source: Are you afraid of the dark? Look no further, the Faucet of Light will solve all your problems. Turn on this tiny table light on and watch as the light pours from its spout, filling the room with a warm and comforting glow.
String.Dest: Are you afraid of the dark? Look no further, the Faucet of Light will solve all your problems. Turn on this tiny table light on and watch as the light pours from its spout, filling the room with a warm and comforting glow.

String.Source: The descendant of the Siren’s Glowing Pylon, the Mini Pylon does not share the same motives as its ancestors. The Mini Pylon is here to help Sims. At least those who do its bidding.
String.Dest: The descendant of the Siren’s Glowing Pylon, the Mini Pylon does not share the same motives as its ancestors. The Mini Pylon is here to help Sims. At least those who do its bidding.

String.Source: The Trash or Treasure line is unique. They can only be purchased at the local Flea Market. Each piece comes with the slightly used smell.
String.Dest: The Trash or Treasure line is unique. They can only be purchased at the local Flea Market. Each piece comes with the slightly used smell.

String.Source: Unlock by purchasing this object at the Flea Market.
String.Dest: Unlock by purchasing this object at the Flea Market.

String.Source: Unlocked by purchasing this object at the Flea Market.
String.Dest: Unlocked by purchasing this object at the Flea Market.

String.Source: With its minimalist design. You can have the perfect candle light dinner in any tight space.
String.Dest: With its minimalist design. You can have the perfect candle light dinner in any tight space.

String.Source: Once in full bloom, these flowers expose their inner candle within. Some say lighting it will cause a Sim’s soul to be illuminated. Others say that’s just ridiculous.
String.Dest: Once in full bloom, these flowers expose their inner candle within. Some say lighting it will cause a Sim’s soul to be illuminated. Others say that’s just ridiculous.

String.Source: The Marker’s ultimate purpose is to create a Necromorph Moon by spreading its alien contagion among the planet. Or so they say? This is just a light, right? It will fill your home with a warm glow, though some users have experienced side effects.
String.Dest: The Marker’s ultimate purpose is to create a Necromorph Moon by spreading its alien contagion among the planet. Or so they say? This is just a light, right? It will fill your home with a warm glow, though some users have experienced side effects.

String.Source: No place for a lamp? No problem. This power grid wall light will illuminate even the smallest of spaces.
String.Dest: No place for a lamp? No problem. This power grid wall light will illuminate even the smallest of spaces.

String.Source: This rustic light fixture will make any modern home feel cozy again. The Exposed Filament wall lamp will make you feel like you are back in the 1920's.
String.Dest: This rustic light fixture will make any modern home feel cozy again. The Exposed Filament wall lamp will make you feel like you are back in the 1920's.

String.Source: Light emanates gently in the upward direction in a series of colors ranging from “warm” to “aesthetically sun-like.” A well-placed Verti-Beam won’t warm your home, but it’ll warm your eye sight, which makes it a perfectly good décor decision.
String.Dest: Light emanates gently in the upward direction in a series of colors ranging from “warm” to “aesthetically sun-like.” A well-placed Verti-Beam won’t warm your home, but it’ll warm your eye sight, which makes it a perfectly good décor decision.

String.Source: When you live up high, your mailbox goes on a wall. Such is life.
String.Dest: When you live up high, your mailbox goes on a wall. Such is life.

String.Source: The Festival Stall has a bunch of swag you can only get from a Festival.
String.Dest: The Festival Stall has a bunch of swag you can only get from a Festival.

String.Source: At the Vegetable and Ingredients Stall, you can purchase vegetables and sometimes exotic spices.
String.Dest: At the Vegetable and Ingredients Stall, you can purchase vegetables and sometimes exotic spices.

String.Source: The Chinese Food Stall serves Egg Rolls, Sweet and Sour Pork, Mapo Tofu with Pork, and Sweet and Sour Eggplant for Sims who prefer no meat.
String.Dest: The Chinese Food Stall serves Egg Rolls, Sweet and Sour Pork, Mapo Tofu with Pork, and Sweet and Sour Eggplant for Sims who prefer no meat.

String.Source: The Filipino Food Stall serves Lumpia, Siopao, and Pork Adobo.
String.Dest: The Filipino Food Stall serves Lumpia, Siopao, and Pork Adobo.

String.Source: The American Food Stall serves Hot Dogs, Hamburgers and other grilled classics, as well as vegetarian options.
String.Dest: The American Food Stall serves Hot Dogs, Hamburgers and other grilled classics, as well as vegetarian options.

String.Source: The Tea and Hot Drink Stall serves various teas and coffee for your drinking pleasure.
String.Dest: The Tea and Hot Drink Stall serves various teas and coffee for your drinking pleasure.

String.Source: The Indian Food Stall serves Curry, as well as Bhel Puri and Samosas for Sims who prefer a vegetarian option.
String.Dest: The Indian Food Stall serves Curry, as well as Bhel Puri and Samosas for Sims who prefer a vegetarian option.

String.Source: The Mexican Food Stall serves Taquitos, Chicken Burrito, Empanadas, and for those who want a vegetarian option, Bean and Cheese Burrito, Spinach Wrapped Veggie Burrito, and Tomato Wrapped Veggie Burrito.
String.Dest: The Mexican Food Stall serves Taquitos, Chicken Burrito, Empanadas, and for those who want a vegetarian option, Bean and Cheese Burrito, Spinach Wrapped Veggie Burrito, and Tomato Wrapped Veggie Burrito.

String.Source: The Moroccan Food Stall serves Brochette, Tajine, and Merguez.
String.Dest: The Moroccan Food Stall serves Brochette, Tajine, and Merguez.

String.Source: The Uptown Food Stall serves a variety of American food that upscale Sims enjoy when they aren't peering down on all the other Sims.
String.Dest: The Uptown Food Stall serves a variety of American food that upscale Sims enjoy when they aren't peering down on all the other Sims.

String.Source: Uptown Sims get a stall that serves cupcakes. Of course they do.
String.Dest: Uptown Sims get a stall that serves cupcakes. Of course they do.

String.Source: Sims in Uptown don't just get regular food. They get gourmet food. Because Uptown.
String.Dest: Sims in Uptown don't just get regular food. They get gourmet food. Because Uptown.

String.Source: Sims from Uptown aren't any less susceptible to dying from the Pufferfish Sushi. Except they are, because the Pufferfish here is of higher quality. So go figure.
String.Dest: Sims from Uptown aren't any less susceptible to dying from the Pufferfish Sushi. Except they are, because the Pufferfish here is of higher quality. So go figure.

String.Source: The Vietnamese Food Stall serves Goi Cuon (Spring Rolls), Banh Mi (Vietnamese Sandwich), and Pho.
String.Dest: The Vietnamese Food Stall serves Goi Cuon (Spring Rolls), Banh Mi (Vietnamese Sandwich), and Pho.

String.Source: The Japanese Food Stall serves Nigiri, Pufferfish Nigiri, Ramen, and Dango for Sims who prefer a vegetarian option.
String.Dest: The Japanese Food Stall serves Nigiri, Pufferfish Nigiri, Ramen, and Dango for Sims who prefer a vegetarian option.

String.Source: Everyone knows the key to winning any political argument is having the loudest voice. Let others know you intend to shout over all of their well-researched talking points by displaying this powerful negotiation tool in your home or apartment. Remember, when the competition’s tough, don’t get smarter, get louder!
String.Dest: Everyone knows the key to winning any political argument is having the loudest voice. Let others know you intend to shout over all of their well-researched talking points by displaying this powerful negotiation tool in your home or apartment. Remember, when the competition’s tough, don’t get smarter, get louder!

String.Source: Deep within the jungles of your home resides an ancient mirror that beckons to travelers and explorers. Here, in your bedroom, stands the visage of a renowned Sim of purpose – you. Stand before the Emperor’s Mirror and claim that which is yours. A good day and a snappy look!
String.Dest: Deep within the jungles of your home resides an ancient mirror that beckons to travelers and explorers. Here, in your bedroom, stands the visage of a renowned Sim of purpose – you. Stand before the Emperor’s Mirror and claim that which is yours. A good day and a snappy look!

String.Source: Sometimes a good long look at your face isn’t quite enough to really ponder your political standing. Sometimes you need to extend that stare to your whole person. Now that I’m certain that I’m standing, what do I stand for? Who do I stand for? Who stands for me? Did I remember my pants today?
String.Dest: Sometimes a good long look at your face isn’t quite enough to really ponder your political standing. Sometimes you need to extend that stare to your whole person. Now that I’m certain that I’m standing, what do I stand for? Who do I stand for? Who stands for me? Did I remember my pants today?

String.Source: For a totally righteous and tuneful voyage, look no further than the DigiRAD Keyboard. Small enough to fit into the most gnarly of spaces and portable so you can rock out anywhere.
String.Dest: For a totally righteous and tuneful voyage, look no further than the DigiRAD Keyboard. Small enough to fit into the most gnarly of spaces and portable so you can rock out anywhere.

String.Source: Paint a variety of different images on the floor including things that are political, illusional, or cultural. Or even a little gangsta'.
String.Dest: Paint a variety of different images on the floor including things that are political, illusional, or cultural. Or even a little gangsta'.

String.Source: Vandalize...er...paint a variety of things on a street garage door. You can paint a whole bunch of stuff. Display them proudly on this door. That doesn't actually open.
String.Dest: Vandalize...er...paint a variety of things on a street garage door. You can paint a whole bunch of stuff. Display them proudly on this door. That doesn't actually open.

String.Source: Paint stuff on this garage door, except this one looks like it can roll up! But it can't really. It's locked. Forever.
String.Dest: Paint stuff on this garage door, except this one looks like it can roll up! But it can't really. It's locked. Forever.

String.Source: Paint a variety of different images on the wall including things that are street, figures, or from nature. Or spray some graffiti. The choice is yours!
String.Dest: Paint a variety of different images on the wall including things that are street, figures, or from nature. Or spray some graffiti. The choice is yours!

String.Source: Unlock by reaching level 8 of the Politics career while in the Politician branch.
String.Dest: Unlock by reaching level 8 of the Politics career while in the Politician branch.

String.Source: Unlocked by reaching level 8 of the Politics career while in the Politician branch.
String.Dest: Unlocked by reaching level 8 of the Politics career while in the Politician branch.

String.Source: One of the original founders of our city, Bernadette sits readily waiting with quill in hand and a knowing, yet challenging gaze. What’s the quill for? It doesn’t matter.
String.Dest: One of the original founders of our city, Bernadette sits readily waiting with quill in hand and a knowing, yet challenging gaze. What’s the quill for? It doesn’t matter.

String.Dest: One of the original founders of our city, Bernadette sits readily waiting with quill in hand and a knowing, yet challenging gaze. What’s the quill for? It doesn’t matter.

String.Source: Unlock by reaching level 8 of the Politics career while in the Charity Organizer branch.
String.Dest: Unlock by reaching level 8 of the Politics career while in the Charity Organizer branch.

String.Source: Unlocked by reaching level 8 of the Politics career while in the Charity Organizer branch.
String.Dest: Unlocked by reaching level 8 of the Politics career while in the Charity Organizer branch.

String.Source: Even though you can only pick one cause for your personal political stance, keep them guessing when you hang your Posters with a Cause. Now you can proudly attempt to please everybody by being for/against everything with these artful statement pieces.
String.Dest: Even though you can only pick one cause for your personal political stance, keep them guessing when you hang your Posters with a Cause. Now you can proudly attempt to please everybody by being for/against everything with these artful statement pieces.
