String.Dest: Even though you can only pick one cause for your personal political stance, keep them guessing when you hang your Posters with a Cause. Now you can proudly attempt to please everybody by being for/against everything with these artful statement pieces.

String.Source: One bright note of color on a serene canvas. The splatter is made with the steady hand of an artist as they try to convey the noise of the world and its effect on our psyche.
String.Dest: One bright note of color on a serene canvas. The splatter is made with the steady hand of an artist as they try to convey the noise of the world and its effect on our psyche.

String.Source: Going against the grain is the humans' natural state, as such you are the path that fights against the rigid walls of society that are always blocking your path. Never made to fit in, but they're all the same.
String.Dest: Going against the grain is the humans' natural state, as such you are the path that fights against the rigid walls of society that are always blocking your path. Never made to fit in, but they're all the same.

String.Source: This painting is like looking upward, watching the industrial cities take over our skylines and encase us in a never breathing cage of isolation.
String.Dest: This painting is like looking upward, watching the industrial cities take over our skylines and encase us in a never breathing cage of isolation.

String.Source: The long sweeping lines remind us of the way that time passes us by. Each line is a past event that will forever have an effect on our daily lives and personalities. It is a constant reminder to be aware of what we do with our lives.
String.Dest: The long sweeping lines remind us of the way that time passes us by. Each line is a past event that will forever have an effect on our daily lives and personalities. It is a constant reminder to be aware of what we do with our lives.

String.Source: While the bridge still transports us from one location to another, each line that has been purposefully misshapen by the artist represents the alternate paths that could have been taken during our lives. Each time that a bridge is crossed a new timeline is created with the idea that we have drastically changed the flow of events.
String.Dest: While the bridge still transports us from one location to another, each line that has been purposefully misshapen by the artist represents the alternate paths that could have been taken during our lives. Each time that a bridge is crossed a new timeline is created with the idea that we have drastically changed the flow of events.

String.Source: The upward sloped mirrors remind people of the self interest they have as they climb their way to the top of the societal pyramid. We cannot get to the top of the world if we do not watch others as they fall below us to help us climb higher.
String.Dest: The upward sloped mirrors remind people of the self interest they have as they climb their way to the top of the societal pyramid. We cannot get to the top of the world if we do not watch others as they fall below us to help us climb higher.

String.Source: Building slowly block by block only to see pieces randomly disappear in unique shapes. What could be more frustrating? Wait...you say that's the point of the game?
String.Dest: Building slowly block by block only to see pieces randomly disappear in unique shapes. What could be more frustrating? Wait...you say that's the point of the game?

String.Source: Death, Destruction, and Natural Disaster. Ahh the possibilities!
String.Dest: Death, Destruction, and Natural Disaster. Ahh the possibilities!

String.Source: An Adventure Platformer with cute square-shaped characters, where could this go wrong?
String.Dest: An Adventure Platformer with cute square-shaped characters, where could this go wrong?

String.Source: Medieval sword fights, and magic. Who could ask for more?
String.Dest: Medieval sword fights, and magic. Who could ask for more?

String.Source: Punch. Punch. Kick. TOTAL KNOCK OUT! You are the boss at this game!
String.Dest: Punch. Punch. Kick. TOTAL KNOCK OUT! You are the boss at this game!

String.Source: A live simulation game that allows you to create your own world and control everyone in it. But it makes you wonder...what if you're being controlled by someone else?
String.Dest: A live simulation game that allows you to create your own world and control everyone in it. But it makes you wonder...what if you're being controlled by someone else?

String.Source: Incredible Sports is the best way to play sports without having to go outside and actually play sports.
String.Dest: Incredible Sports is the best way to play sports without having to go outside and actually play sports.

String.Source: Popularity has its benefits, how else would you get signatures for such an old game.
String.Dest: Popularity has its benefits, how else would you get signatures for such an old game.

String.Source: Unlock by reaching level 5 of the Social Media career while in the Internet Personality branch.
String.Dest: Unlock by reaching level 5 of the Social Media career while in the Internet Personality branch.

String.Source: Unlocked by reaching level 5 of the Social Media career while in the Internet Personality branch.
String.Dest: Unlocked by reaching level 5 of the Social Media career while in the Internet Personality branch.

String.Source: Unlock by reaching level 8 of the Social Media career while in the Public Relations branch.
String.Dest: Unlock by reaching level 8 of the Social Media career while in the Public Relations branch.

String.Source: Unlocked by reaching level 8 of the Social Media career while in the Public Relations branch.
String.Dest: Unlocked by reaching level 8 of the Social Media career while in the Public Relations branch.

String.Source: You are the true master of this game. Sims should want your signature, not the other way around.
String.Dest: You are the true master of this game. Sims should want your signature, not the other way around.

String.Source: Cherish this original jersey from the Most Amazing Player (M.A.P.) ever to grace the courts of San Myshuno.
String.Dest: Cherish this original jersey from the Most Amazing Player (M.A.P.) ever to grace the courts of San Myshuno.

String.Source: FuzzRead is typically an online-only news source, but you were too proud of your contributing article “Ten Reasons to Read Articles Written by Me” not to print it out and frame it.
String.Dest: FuzzRead is typically an online-only news source, but you were too proud of your contributing article “Ten Reasons to Read Articles Written by Me” not to print it out and frame it.

String.Source: This signed poster was given as a Thank You for streaming MySims Go! on your Social Media channel, and always being a huge supporter of the game.
String.Dest: This signed poster was given as a Thank You for streaming MySims Go! on your Social Media channel, and always being a huge supporter of the game.

String.Source: Like Kings and Queens of their own realm the R.E.F.U.G.E. creators rule over the lands. It's only by their grace that you, a lowly peasant, got this poster signed.
String.Dest: Like Kings and Queens of their own realm the R.E.F.U.G.E. creators rule over the lands. It's only by their grace that you, a lowly peasant, got this poster signed.

String.Source: This is the pinnacle of tournament games. There is nothing better than getting the signatures of all the top players!
String.Dest: This is the pinnacle of tournament games. There is nothing better than getting the signatures of all the top players!

String.Source: The Developers of Sims Forever were happy to sign your poster! Now try to figure out which signature belongs to which one!
String.Dest: The Developers of Sims Forever were happy to sign your poster! Now try to figure out which signature belongs to which one!

String.Source: After getting this poster signed by the sports stars featured in the game one player promptly fell over and started calling foul on you. That was about the time you thought it was best to go back to your digital version instead of the live sport.
String.Dest: After getting this poster signed by the sports stars featured in the game one player promptly fell over and started calling foul on you. That was about the time you thought it was best to go back to your digital version instead of the live sport.

String.Source: The classic blue door is a piece that has been created by many artists over the years, but I'm sure we can all objectively agree this one is the best.
String.Dest: The classic blue door is a piece that has been created by many artists over the years, but I'm sure we can all objectively agree this one is the best.

String.Source: Koi often travel in pairs and it's a strange mysterious thing when you watch them circle each other as they almost form yin and yang.
String.Dest: Koi often travel in pairs and it's a strange mysterious thing when you watch them circle each other as they almost form yin and yang.

String.Source: These mountains have been rendered in a classic ink style. If you watch long enough it almost feels as if the clouds are slowly creeping in further and further.
String.Dest: These mountains have been rendered in a classic ink style. If you watch long enough it almost feels as if the clouds are slowly creeping in further and further.

String.Source: When the world has gone too far we can always find a touch of beauty in anything.
String.Dest: When the world has gone too far we can always find a touch of beauty in anything.

String.Source: This henna styled painting is popular through many cultures giving a detailed and stylized look to anywhere it hangs.
String.Dest: This henna styled painting is popular through many cultures giving a detailed and stylized look to anywhere it hangs.

String.Source: While many cultures have the idea of a Tree of Life, this paints a whole new idea with a tree that brings food.
String.Dest: While many cultures have the idea of a Tree of Life, this paints a whole new idea with a tree that brings food.

String.Source: Nights with a crescent moon are usually calm and peaceful...Until you find out that you're all alone and hear odd noises in the middle of the night.
String.Dest: Nights with a crescent moon are usually calm and peaceful...Until you find out that you're all alone and hear odd noises in the middle of the night.

String.Source: Designs are strategically placed and tiled throughout this design to make the viewer try to decide if the images are moving.
String.Dest: Designs are strategically placed and tiled throughout this design to make the viewer try to decide if the images are moving.

String.Source: There is a flower that is always in bloom, and it's slowly spreading to encompass the whole scroll.
String.Dest: There is a flower that is always in bloom, and it's slowly spreading to encompass the whole scroll.

String.Source: While the person in the image only has one eye, there are many eyes helping them constantly keep a watch over you.
String.Dest: While the person in the image only has one eye, there are many eyes helping them constantly keep a watch over you.

String.Source: This scroll has captured the moment as the sun reddens the sky. The real question is whether it is as the sun comes up or goes down.
String.Dest: This scroll has captured the moment as the sun reddens the sky. The real question is whether it is as the sun comes up or goes down.

String.Source: These blossoms are some of the most beautiful in the world. It's said they sometimes look like snow as they fall. How romantic.
String.Dest: These blossoms are some of the most beautiful in the world. It's said they sometimes look like snow as they fall. How romantic.

String.Source: The city is a beautiful place, but not everyone can afford a top-floor penthouse with a view. Now it doesn’t matter! Any room is a room with a view when you install this latest piece from local artist Cale Caesar.
String.Dest: The city is a beautiful place, but not everyone can afford a top-floor penthouse with a view. Now it doesn’t matter! Any room is a room with a view when you install this latest piece from local artist Cale Caesar.

String.Source: Room with a View Wall Painting
String.Dest: Room with a View Wall Painting

String.Source: Unlock by reaching level 6 of the Critic career while in the Arts Critic branch.
String.Dest: Unlock by reaching level 6 of the Critic career while in the Arts Critic branch.

String.Source: Unlocked by reaching level 6 of the Critic career while in the Arts Critic branch
String.Dest: Unlocked by reaching level 6 of the Critic career while in the Arts Critic branch

String.Source: No longer satisfied with just taking pictures of her food before every meal, local artist Maureen Perry has taken to painting extravagant murals of everything she orders, much to the chagrin of restaurant owners citywide.
String.Dest: No longer satisfied with just taking pictures of her food before every meal, local artist Maureen Perry has taken to painting extravagant murals of everything she orders, much to the chagrin of restaurant owners citywide.

String.Source: This Cake is No Lie Wall Painting
String.Dest: This Cake is No Lie Wall Painting

String.Source: Unlock by reaching level 7 of the Critic career while in the Food Critic branch.
String.Dest: Unlock by reaching level 7 of the Critic career while in the Food Critic branch.

String.Source: Unlocked by reaching level 7 of the Critic career while in the Food Critic branch
String.Dest: Unlocked by reaching level 7 of the Critic career while in the Food Critic branch

String.Source: These fine works of art will fill you with visions of deep shadows or abundant colors. Fame or loss. Day or night. The amount of contrast will make you unsure of all you hold dear in life.
String.Dest: These fine works of art will fill you with visions of deep shadows or abundant colors. Fame or loss. Day or night. The amount of contrast will make you unsure of all you hold dear in life.

String.Source: This tri pieced painting is perfect when you want to feel like you live somewhere exotic. Just look at it and imagine it's a window as you look out into the world.
String.Dest: This tri pieced painting is perfect when you want to feel like you live somewhere exotic. Just look at it and imagine it's a window as you look out into the world.

String.Source: A cultural image with a bright sun... It's reminding you of a song that is impossible to get out of your head once it starts playing.
String.Dest: A cultural image with a bright sun... It's reminding you of a song that is impossible to get out of your head once it starts playing.

String.Source: Elephants are extraordinary creatures, but they'll never forget if you call them fat.
String.Dest: Elephants are extraordinary creatures, but they'll never forget if you call them fat.

String.Source: The art of holding a sword steady takes years of practice, can you imagine how different this painting would be if the model was always moving?
String.Dest: The art of holding a sword steady takes years of practice, can you imagine how different this painting would be if the model was always moving?

String.Source: One bright note of color on a serene canvas. The splatter is made with the steady hand of an artist as they try to convey the noise of the world and its effect on our psyche.
String.Dest: One bright note of color on a serene canvas. The splatter is made with the steady hand of an artist as they try to convey the noise of the world and its effect on our psyche.

String.Source: Going against the grain is the humans' natural state, as such you are the path that fights against the rigid walls of society that are always blocking your path. Never made to fit in, but they're all the same.
String.Dest: Going against the grain is the humans' natural state, as such you are the path that fights against the rigid walls of society that are always blocking your path. Never made to fit in, but they're all the same.

String.Source: This painting is like looking upward, watching the industrial cities take over our skylines and encase us in a never breathing cage of isolation.
String.Dest: This painting is like looking upward, watching the industrial cities take over our skylines and encase us in a never breathing cage of isolation.

String.Source: The long sweeping lines remind us of the way that time passes us by. Each line is a past event that will forever have an effect on our daily lives and personalities. It is a constant reminder to be aware of what we do with our lives.
String.Dest: The long sweeping lines remind us of the way that time passes us by. Each line is a past event that will forever have an effect on our daily lives and personalities. It is a constant reminder to be aware of what we do with our lives.

String.Source: While the bridge still transports us from one location to another, each line that has been purposefully misshapen by the artist represents the alternate paths that could have been taken during our lives. Each time that a bridge is crossed a new timeline is created with the idea that we have drastically changed the flow of events.
String.Dest: While the bridge still transports us from one location to another, each line that has been purposefully misshapen by the artist represents the alternate paths that could have been taken during our lives. Each time that a bridge is crossed a new timeline is created with the idea that we have drastically changed the flow of events.

String.Source: The upward sloped mirrors remind people of the self interest they have as they climb their way to the top of the societal pyramid. We cannot get to the top of the world if we do not watch others as they fall below us to help us climb higher.
String.Dest: The upward sloped mirrors remind people of the self interest they have as they climb their way to the top of the societal pyramid. We cannot get to the top of the world if we do not watch others as they fall below us to help us climb higher.

String.Source: Do you like to steal the show? Are you always the center of attention? Well the Center Stage Performance Space will ensure that all eyes are on you as you play face melting solos on your guitar or violin.
String.Dest: Do you like to steal the show? Are you always the center of attention? Well the Center Stage Performance Space will ensure that all eyes are on you as you play face melting solos on your guitar or violin.

String.Source: The True Performer's Performance Space shows everyone that you know your stuff. With a generator that big you can be sure that the lights will be running for as long as your music is playing.
String.Dest: The True Performer's Performance Space shows everyone that you know your stuff. With a generator that big you can be sure that the lights will be running for as long as your music is playing.

String.Source: What is a rose, but a rose in its name? Regal and divine, this rose branch will evoke all feelings of elegance and romance. It will engulf your lot with an exquisite aroma that you can't simply avoid.
String.Dest: What is a rose, but a rose in its name? Regal and divine, this rose branch will evoke all feelings of elegance and romance. It will engulf your lot with an exquisite aroma that you can't simply avoid.

String.Source: So many flowers! These flowers resemble a sun-like knitting, stitched together to form the perfect yarn of blooming floral arrangements.
String.Dest: So many flowers! These flowers resemble a sun-like knitting, stitched together to form the perfect yarn of blooming floral arrangements.

String.Source: A beautiful focal point and an organic display of patinas will make your place decadent yet still modern.
String.Dest: A beautiful focal point and an organic display of patinas will make your place decadent yet still modern.

String.Source: Have you ever wanted to give the illusion that your plants are suspended in mid air? This planter box won't fool anyone. But it looks kind of cool.
String.Dest: Have you ever wanted to give the illusion that your plants are suspended in mid air? This planter box won't fool anyone. But it looks kind of cool.

String.Source: The majestic lily is one of the most beautiful exotic flowers. This handcrafted arrangement is so lifelike you will be tempted to lean and give them a good smell. Then you realize they are fake and all hope is lost.
String.Dest: The majestic lily is one of the most beautiful exotic flowers. This handcrafted arrangement is so lifelike you will be tempted to lean and give them a good smell. Then you realize they are fake and all hope is lost.

String.Source: A commemorative plaque from Welp Reviews, in recognition of your notoriously harsh criticism of local cuisine. Who knew you were so good at complaining? Doubles as an extra set of cutlery when you’re sick of doing the dishes.
String.Dest: A commemorative plaque from Welp Reviews, in recognition of your notoriously harsh criticism of local cuisine. Who knew you were so good at complaining? Doubles as an extra set of cutlery when you’re sick of doing the dishes.

String.Dest: When asked their favorite platform from which to deliver a stirring oration, famous speaker Orvilla deSpeesh said, without question, the Rostrum Station. Its sound quality and quality materials make it second to none.

String.Source: The PODUS is an internationally recognized platform from which interesting commentary, ideas, and hot takes emerge. Stand behind the PODUS to stand tall!
String.Dest: The PODUS is an internationally recognized platform from which interesting commentary, ideas, and hot takes emerge. Stand behind the PODUS to stand tall!

String.Source: These curtains are designed for the simple individual who wants privacy, but hates lavish and stuffy curtains. Bigger than the small and medium versions.
String.Dest: These curtains are designed for the simple individual who wants privacy, but hates lavish and stuffy curtains. Bigger than the small and medium versions.

String.Source: What do you want? To buy? To see? To smell? To be? The What’s New Selling Platform will tell you and every other Sim who walks by day after day. With several taste-making choices and alternative, the What’s New will be defining consumer need for years to come.

String.Dest: Just one billboard isn't enough. There is always more to show off and entice customers with. Don't you want to spend your whole paycheck on new items without worrying about paying rent and utilities? Who needs lights...

String.Source: It may look scrumptious, but this food is not for eating. Made from the finest compostable plastics, enjoy all the benefits of a floor littered with food scraps without hardly any of the stench!
String.Dest: It may look scrumptious, but this food is not for eating. Made from the finest compostable plastics, enjoy all the benefits of a floor littered with food scraps without hardly any of the stench!

String.Source: Romance isn’t dead, but these flowers sure are. Get in the mood for love by scattering pieces of Mother Nature’s most beautiful creations all over the floor of your home or apartment. This is romance- trust us!
String.Dest: Romance isn’t dead, but these flowers sure are. Get in the mood for love by scattering pieces of Mother Nature’s most beautiful creations all over the floor of your home or apartment. This is romance- trust us!

String.Source: Treat yourself, specially your feet, and indulge in this trendy and luxurious plush rug that only feels expensive but really isn’t.
String.Dest: Treat yourself, specially your feet, and indulge in this trendy and luxurious plush rug that only feels expensive but really isn’t.

String.Source: Soft and plush, this stylish rug will make any room explode in vibrant colors. When you stare upon this rug you will be transported to a peaceful and serene oasis. Forget all your troubles and relax.
String.Dest: Soft and plush, this stylish rug will make any room explode in vibrant colors. When you stare upon this rug you will be transported to a peaceful and serene oasis. Forget all your troubles and relax.

String.Dest: The Trouk Fringe rug comes in a multitude of styles, from modern to classic it covers it all.

String.Source: A rug that awakens your inner artist. Featuring a combination of strategically placed speckles of color, this rug will make everyone feel as if they lived in an artist's loft or studio. However, if this rug doesn't wake up your artistic desires, it is perfect for hiding everyday messes.
String.Dest: A rug that awakens your inner artist. Featuring a combination of strategically placed speckles of color, this rug will make everyone feel as if they lived in an artist's loft or studio. However, if this rug doesn't wake up your artistic desires, it is perfect for hiding everyday messes.

String.Source: Well, not JUST a tarp. It is definitely still a tarp. But it also doubles as a flea market display, an oversized dinner placemat, or the world’s most uncomfortable blanket. How versatile!
String.Dest: Well, not JUST a tarp. It is definitely still a tarp. But it also doubles as a flea market display, an oversized dinner placemat, or the world’s most uncomfortable blanket. How versatile!

String.Source: Think deeply as you wiggle your toes on top of your current flooring. Is it vibrant, colorful, and fulfilling to the eyes? Perhaps not, though that could just be your gnarly toes. The Colorful Beneath IS all of those things and soft to the touch. Perhaps it’s time you dig deep to go Beneath?
String.Dest: Think deeply as you wiggle your toes on top of your current flooring. Is it vibrant, colorful, and fulfilling to the eyes? Perhaps not, though that could just be your gnarly toes. The Colorful Beneath IS all of those things and soft to the touch. Perhaps it’s time you dig deep to go Beneath?

String.Source: We scraped the finest colored chalk from the sides of organic mountains to create a pool of the most vibrant, luscious, rock-based colors. Then, upon further reflection, proper dyes were obtained to imprint true saturated color on hand-woven rugs. After all, rocks don’t stick to cloth.
String.Dest: We scraped the finest colored chalk from the sides of organic mountains to create a pool of the most vibrant, luscious, rock-based colors. Then, upon further reflection, proper dyes were obtained to imprint true saturated color on hand-woven rugs. After all, rocks don’t stick to cloth.

String.Source: We dove metaphorically deep to extricate the idea for this elaborate explosion of color and stone the likes of which no human eyes have ever seen. Some infused with colors reminiscent of the fiery earth’s core, or the sunset upon re-entry from an orbital capsule, The Chromaticalliptic Mosaic is a profound and austere thing to stand upon.
String.Dest: We dove metaphorically deep to extricate the idea for this elaborate explosion of color and stone the likes of which no human eyes have ever seen. Some infused with colors reminiscent of the fiery earth’s core, or the sunset upon re-entry from an orbital capsule, The Chromaticalliptic Mosaic is a profound and austere thing to stand upon.

String.Source: Running out of space on your floor? Still need a way to separate your side of the apartment from your roommates? Look no further than the Lavish Divider line. The Lavishly Short Divider is perfect for any home with low ceilings.
String.Dest: Running out of space on your floor? Still need a way to separate your side of the apartment from your roommates? Look no further than the Lavish Divider line. The Lavishly Short Divider is perfect for any home with low ceilings.

String.Source: No one quite knows how self-proclaimed celebrity and daredevil ‘Emperor’ Horton got his hands on an entire pufferfish, but everyone knows it wasn’t a great idea when he tried to eat the poisonous fish. The Emperor will be dearly missed.

String.Source: In an age of smart phones and constant social connection, it’s key to have a benchmark of activity by which to root oneself. The Neighborhood Festival Alert is a tangible banner that notifies and informs all who gaze up from their glowing handheld devices to learn more about their local haunts.

String.Source: Sure, this divider helps bring separation to rooms. But don't try changing behind it, you can totally see right through it.
String.Dest: Sure, this divider helps bring separation to rooms. But don't try changing behind it, you can totally see right through it.

String.Source: The eccentric shapes adorning this divider will help any kindergartner learn basic shapes such as the circle and the square. Place it anywhere you want Sims to learn about things with the same diameter.
String.Dest: The eccentric shapes adorning this divider will help any kindergartner learn basic shapes such as the circle and the square. Place it anywhere you want Sims to learn about things with the same diameter.

String.Source: Here is a simple drain, for a simple place. What secrets does it hold? Wouldn't you like to know?
String.Dest: Here is a simple drain, for a simple place. What secrets does it hold? Wouldn't you like to know?

String.Source: Look up! The colorful and festive tassels of The Gateway will greet all who enter, while simultaneously guarding the heads of entrants from excess bird droppings and building sludge. Don’t believe us? Stand just beneath The Gateway and see if just a smidge less bird feces adorns your head!
String.Dest: Look up! The colorful and festive tassels of The Gateway will greet all who enter, while simultaneously guarding the heads of entrants from excess bird droppings and building sludge. Don’t believe us? Stand just beneath The Gateway and see if just a smidge less bird feces adorns your head!

String.Source: Look up yet again! Folks entering the local festival needed a beacon to light their way from point A to B in the grand festival that is city life. Our quality is second to none! When asked to give their impressions, several consumers noted rather quaintly “It’s lit!”
String.Dest: Look up yet again! Folks entering the local festival needed a beacon to light their way from point A to B in the grand festival that is city life. Our quality is second to none! When asked to give their impressions, several consumers noted rather quaintly “It’s lit!”

String.Dest: The bright colors displayed on this sign are sure to pull all eyes to it, ready to convince you to buy, buy, buy.

String.Source: You too will paint having these around. We think.

String.Source: Pennants brighten up any street with color. They come in multiple shapes, sizes and patterns to decorate any street or neighborhood.
String.Dest: Pennants brighten up any street with color. They come in multiple shapes, sizes and patterns to decorate any street or neighborhood.

String.Source: This Park was once the estate of scientist and herring baron Barnabas Skye. After his mansion was gutted by fire, the fish mogul gifted his extensive gardens to the people on the proviso that his personal Observatory remain standing and free of use to any budding astronomer living in the city. To this day the telescope is maintained and updated by the Barnabassian Scientific Society.
String.Dest: This Park was once the estate of scientist and herring baron Barnabas Skye. After his mansion was gutted by fire, the fish mogul gifted his extensive gardens to the people on the proviso that his personal Observatory remain standing and free of use to any budding astronomer living in the city. To this day the telescope is maintained and updated by the Barnabassian Scientific Society.

String.Source: Raised in memory of the Open Street Act, legislation which allowed communities of all cultures to organize celebrations in the streets. The progressive vision of our founding fathers has allowed generations of residents enjoy the many delights that 'Festival City' has to offer. (Plaque donated by DynaSign Co. 'If it's in the streets, it's on our Signs' (TM))
String.Dest: Raised in memory of the Open Street Act, legislation which allowed communities of all cultures to organize celebrations in the streets. The progressive vision of our founding fathers has allowed generations of residents enjoy the many delights that 'Festival City' has to offer. (Plaque donated by DynaSign Co. 'If it's in the streets, it's on our Signs' (TM))

String.Source: This Plaque was erected to mark 150 years of fishery in our fine city. From the humble kedgeree peddlers of the gold rush era to the mighty height of the Canning Industry, the noble Spangled Herring (Clupea Pallasii Fabulousa) has been the slippery, silvery key to the fortunes of this city. As we step into a bold new century, let us not forget the bounty of the sea, nor the piscine origins of our metropolis.
String.Dest: This Plaque was erected to mark 150 years of fishery in our fine city. From the humble kedgeree peddlers of the gold rush era to the mighty height of the Canning Industry, the noble Spangled Herring (Clupea Pallasii Fabulousa) has been the slippery, silvery key to the fortunes of this city. As we step into a bold new century, let us not forget the bounty of the sea, nor the piscine origins of our metropolis.

String.Source: This plaque commemorates the Shirt Factory Meteor Strike And Subsequent Big Lizard Incident that razed the Fashion District to ash. Like a phoenix reborn, the District has risen from this disaster to become an exemplar of regeneration, with award winning modern architecture and a vibrant festival scene.
String.Dest: This plaque commemorates the Shirt Factory Meteor Strike And Subsequent Big Lizard Incident that razed the Fashion District to ash. Like a phoenix reborn, the District has risen from this disaster to become an exemplar of regeneration, with award winning modern architecture and a vibrant festival scene.

String.Source: On this spot the Llama Freedom Movement was born. A simple protest, known as the Llamoid Sit-In, shocked the public with its extreme use of acoustic guitars, hair flowers and slightly tuneless singing. Though many years have passed since that day, the spirit of activism remains alive and well, and will continue until all Llamas are free to strut and spit and neck wrestle to their heart's content. (Plaque paid for by the Llamean Popular People's Front)
String.Dest: On this spot the Llama Freedom Movement was born. A simple protest, known as the Llamoid Sit-In, shocked the public with its extreme use of acoustic guitars, hair flowers and slightly tuneless singing. Though many years have passed since that day, the spirit of activism remains alive and well, and will continue until all Llamas are free to strut and spit and neck wrestle to their heart's content. (Plaque paid for by the Llamean Popular People's Front)

String.Source: There are many a merry tale about Zaky the Donkey. Kings and commoners alike traveled miles through the stark desert for a chance to meet Zaky. As lore tells, he had a wild sense of humor and a heart of gold that made him a local celebrity in his small farming village. Bring the zesty spirit of Zaky to your own abode with the dip-backed sculpture made to commemorate his goodwill.

String.Source: One pipe, one dream. This simple pipe has been neglected its entire life. The unit waits quietly in basements, or wherever placed, plotting revenge for the social sleight and neglect. Whenever one travels to the basement, they feel the pipe’s metaphorical gaze. Or, are these merely pipe dreams?
String.Dest: One pipe, one dream. This simple pipe has been neglected its entire life. The unit waits quietly in basements, or wherever placed, plotting revenge for the social sleight and neglect. Whenever one travels to the basement, they feel the pipe’s metaphorical gaze. Or, are these merely pipe dreams?

String.Source: Geometric Perfection, like its name strongly implies, was designed by well-meaning Sims, but perfectly constructed by cold-unthinking machines. Every piece is perfectly identical, without imperfections or impurities. Not a single scratch or blemish adorns this magnificent piece of craftsmanship. Be awed, Sim.
String.Dest: Geometric Perfection, like its name strongly implies, was designed by well-meaning Sims, but perfectly constructed by cold-unthinking machines. Every piece is perfectly identical, without imperfections or impurities. Not a single scratch or blemish adorns this magnificent piece of craftsmanship. Be awed, Sim.

String.Source:
“What is it? What is this? What is this that is seen while looking at this piece? This face, is it a face? It just stares into space.”
These words were found written in the back of this piece. We don’t really know the artist's intent, but we think it is thought provoking and enchanting.

“What is it? What is this? What is this that is seen while looking at this piece? This face, is it a face? It just stares into space.”

String.Source: Back before coffee and other heated caffeinated beverages became trendy, and well before coffee was merely a device for hosting quantities of whipped cream, a small independent shop known as The Hot Thistle was a fine purveyor of percolating brews. Unfortunately, larger corporate interests edged them out. Did they close their doors? No! They sold signs instead. When you can’t steep ‘em, sign ‘em.
String.Dest: Back before coffee and other heated caffeinated beverages became trendy, and well before coffee was merely a device for hosting quantities of whipped cream, a small independent shop known as The Hot Thistle was a fine purveyor of percolating brews. Unfortunately, larger corporate interests edged them out. Did they close their doors? No! They sold signs instead. When you can’t steep ‘em, sign ‘em.

String.Source: As you approach a venue of repute, one that’s caught your fancy sufficiently to travel to it alone or with a posse of your finest pals, you want to know what you’re about to enter. What you’re getting yourself into. A Sign of Things to Come is literally and figuratively that. It’s a sign that tells the future, your future, assuming you follow through with every step.
String.Dest: As you approach a venue of repute, one that’s caught your fancy sufficiently to travel to it alone or with a posse of your finest pals, you want to know what you’re about to enter. String.Source: The billowing steam emanates from a broth of delicious noodles, a cup of delicate tea, or something else that beckons your chopsticks spoon it out and toss it into your mouth. The Piping Hot is perfect to announce to the world: this building sells some of those things.

String.Source: The original Piping Pot was built in the old world sometime before explorers discovered hot tea tasted far better when you actually steeped the leaves in the boiling broth. The Piping Pot was an innovator in this flavored water reminiscent of fragrant leaves and other elements that strike the nose as the cup is tipped. Call forth tea lovers with this imitation of the original Piping Pot sign, which has long crumbled from steam related damages.

String.Source: This simple porcelain sink brings any bathroom together with its minimalist design. This sink will take up no space at all.

String.Source: Ornately woven from stone, wood, and an assortment of other natural, sustainable materials, the Braided Seat is a firm, resolute position for one’s posterior regardless of stature and size. The Braided Seat instantly conveys a sense of hand woven trust and care, though clearly tools were involved.
String.Dest: Ornately woven from stone, wood, and an assortment of other natural, sustainable materials, the Braided Seat is a firm, resolute position for one’s posterior regardless of stature and size. String.Source:
After their success with their restaurant retro line, Savalani’s decided to take on a more modern approach to their chair designs. This piece is not only beautiful but gives your dining experience a hint of luxury often not thought for simple dining chairs. Leather chairs for dining? Who would have thought?
Rumor has it Savalani himself designed this chair after many iterations and hot tea runs.
String.Dest:
After their success with their restaurant retro line, Savalani’s decided to take on a more modern approach to their chair designs. This piece is not only beautiful but gives your dining experience a hint of luxury often not thought for simple dining chairs. Leather chairs for dining? Who would have thought?
Rumor has it Savalani himself designed this chair after many iterations and hot tea runs.

String.Source: Slippery when wet. Don’t expect to sit still on this slick and velvety seat. Time after time the Velvety Cathedra has bested its users by thrusting them to the ground with masterful prowess.
String.Dest: Slippery when wet. Don’t expect to sit still on this slick and velvety seat. Time after time the Velvety Cathedra has bested its users by thrusting them to the ground with masterful prowess.

String.Source: Foldy was a simple chair. He had big dreams of once becoming a big star. He wanted to have pictures on billboards and become a star like all of the other big time chairs. What better place for Foldy to succeed than in the big city!
String.Dest: Foldy was a simple chair. He had big dreams of once becoming a big star. He wanted to have pictures on billboards and become a star like all of the other big time chairs. What better place for Foldy to succeed than in the big city!

String.Source: Strappy is Foldy's brother. He has found a good life in the big city, working a small time job as a bar chair, but Strappy has bigger dreams.
String.Dest: Strappy is Foldy's brother. He has found a good life in the big city, working a small time job as a bar chair, but Strappy has bigger dreams.

String.Source: Ever wanted a leather sofa, but 'aren't' into the seemingly 'old look' that most of them share? The Modern Leather Sofa will ease all your 'old look' bad vibes and give you a comfortable and rich experience for your seating pleasure. From the mind of Savalani, the troubled chair genius, one day waking up from slumber, he realized that sofas and chairs are in the same family of furniture relationships. "Why not?" he said as 'he' created this masterpiece with glee.
String.Dest: Ever wanted a leather sofa, but 'aren't' into the seemingly 'old look' that most of them share? The Modern Leather Sofa will ease all your 'old look' bad vibes and give you a comfortable and rich experience for your seating pleasure. From the mind of Savalani, the troubled chair genius, one day waking up from slumber, he realized that sofas and chairs are in the same family of furniture relationships. "Why not?" he said as 'he' created this masterpiece with glee.

String.Source: Support your lower back muscles and spinal sinews in style while keeping onlookers at bay while you read and relax. If reading isn't your thing, stare ominously.

String.Source: The Nordshine Double takes the stylish choices of the single, and multiplies them. Not by one, not by 1 and a half, but by a resounding two. Form meets factor, twice, with the Nordshine Double.
String.Dest: The Nordshine Double takes the stylish choices of the single, and multiplies them. Not by one, not by 1 and a half, but by a resounding two. Form meets factor, twice, with the Nordshine Double.

String.Source: Regardless of who you are, where you came from, or where you wish to go, the Split-Beam/Split-Personality Bench has a pattern and color reminiscent of your past or present or now. Its solid wood beams are bedecked with elaborately painted patterns that harken to the simpler, sweeter moments you cherish, or will cherish, depending on your path.
String.Dest: Regardless of who you are, where you came from, or where you wish to go, the Split-Beam/Split-Personality Bench has a pattern and color reminiscent of your past or present or now. Its solid wood beams are bedecked with elaborately painted patterns that harken to the simpler, sweeter moments you cherish, or will cherish, depending on your path.

String.Source: This ottoman sports both comfort and book storage. If you are running out of room to store your book collection, primarily because you insist on remaining in the 20th century with your physical book collection, this ottoman has you covered. But seriously, consider going digital.
String.Dest: This ottoman sports both comfort and book storage. If you are running out of room to store your book collection, primarily because you insist on remaining in the 20th century with your physical book collection, this ottoman has you covered. But seriously, consider going digital.

String.Source: “Couches are so complex,” someone has probably said before. “After a complex day in my complex life, I just wish there was something simple for me to sit on,” they potentially added. Furniture author, Savalani, possibly heard them loud and clear when he created this simply inspired seating arrangement, molded from a single piece of metal and wrapped in the finest of Cowplant leather.
String.Dest: “Couches are so complex,” someone has probably said before. “After a complex day in my complex life, I just wish there was something simple for me to sit on,” they potentially added. Furniture author, Savalani, possibly heard them loud and clear when he created this simply inspired seating arrangement, molded from a single piece of metal and wrapped in the finest of Cowplant leather.

String.Source: The Diving Sit Oblonger is a bench without overly hand-holding back support, and a bizarre shape that is reminiscent of a cannon protruding from an ancient ship of sail, or perhaps, yes, a diving board! Don’t dive off, but settle in for a good sit. Just don’t lean back in the Oblonger, as it won’t reach down to save you.
String.Dest: The Diving Sit Oblonger is a bench without overly hand-holding back support, and a bizarre shape that is reminiscent of a cannon protruding from an ancient ship of sail, or perhaps, yes, a diving board! String.Source: Curry is in fact one of the cheapest spices. Although used in many common dishes it gets compared similarly to saffron for its ability to transform the color of food, the culinary uses of the two spices should not be confused and should never replace saffron in food dishes.
String.Dest: Curry is in fact one of the cheapest spices. Although used in many common dishes it gets compared similarly to saffron for its ability to transform the color of food, the culinary uses of the two spices should not be confused and should never replace saffron in food dishes.

String.Source: Coming from the dried stigmas, it takes an astounding 75,000 blossoms or 225,000 hand-picked stigmas to make a single pound which explains why it is the world’s most expensive spice.
String.Dest: Coming from the dried stigmas, it takes an astounding 75,000 blossoms or 225,000 hand-picked stigmas to make a single pound which explains why it is the world’s most expensive spice.

String.Source: After the unsuccessful launch of their first four products, the HiOne, HiTwo, HiThree and HiFour, local startup High Fidelity Audio was surprised and astounded to see the newly-named HiFive fly off the shelves. “No one can quite figure out why this model has done so much better than the others,” said a marketing representative for the company, “but it was probably the promotional bottled water we gave out at the launch event.”
String.Dest: After the unsuccessful launch of their first four products, the HiOne, HiTwo, HiThree and HiFour, local startup High Fidelity Audio was surprised and astounded to see the newly-named HiFive fly off the shelves. “No one can quite figure out why this model has done so much better than the others,” said a marketing representative for the company, “but it was probably the promotional bottled water we gave out at the launch event.”

String.Source: Separate, but connected. Distinct, but unified. The Happy Marriage, by Reclamation Homeware, represents the complex but rewarding task of sharing your life with someone while maintaining your individuality. Oh, and it’s also a coffee table!
String.Dest: Separate, but connected. Distinct, but unified. The Happy Marriage, by Reclamation Homeware, represents the complex but rewarding task of sharing your life with someone while maintaining your individuality. Oh, and it’s also a coffee table!

String.Source: Programmer-turned-sculptor, Polly Lowenstein, claims the designs for this coffee table came to her during an afternoon nap in a company-provided SleepPod. In the dream, an omnipresent voice told her this simple geometric table would greatly improve efficiency for The Great Processor, whatever that means.

String.Source: Baako and Anaya came to the bustling city of San Myshuno so Baako could broaden his career as a rising comedian and so Anaya could get clarity on which one of her passions to focus on as her career: inspiring songstress or successful painter? Their quirky kiddo, Billie is happy to be along for the ride. This social butterfly has no filter when it comes to making new friends - even if that involves barging in uninvited to her neighbors' apartments!

String.Source: Dear Garbage Man: We assume you have a career in garbage, based on the smell coming from your apartment. Surely you don't call that food. Do you? Do you! Should we call the cops? Because we will if that smell doesn't go away.

String.Dest: Dear Awkward Mailbox Neighbor - Please let us get our mail in peace. The incessant small talk? The inquiries about our letters? The package jokes? Just stop. Let us claim our mail and retreat.

String.Source: Where have all the good times gone? They're here, and you're invited to join us to enjoy them.
String.Dest: Where have all the good times gone? They're here, and you're invited to join us to enjoy them.

String.Source: Boost your confidence. You're probably doing better than you think.
String.Dest: Boost your confidence. You're probably doing better than you think.

String.Source: Don't be glum, we've all had that day. Just remember that tomorrow will be better.
String.Dest: Don't be glum, we've all had that day. Just remember that tomorrow will be better.

String.Source: I know you can make it through the day!
String.Dest: I know you can make it through the day!

String.Source: You should totally try out for the local opera! Yeah, you're great! Just wonderful! Maybe you could live at the opera too, and not here. Signed, we hate your singing.
String.Dest: You should totally try out for the local opera! Yeah, you're great! Just wonderful! Maybe you could live at the opera too, and not here. Signed, we hate your singing.

String.Source: Avoid loud noises at night, your neighbors may be trying to sleep.
String.Dest: Avoid loud noises at night, your neighbors may be trying to sleep.

String.Source: Remember to take a load off once in a while and just enjoy the little things.
String.Dest: Remember to take a load off once in a while and just enjoy the little things.

String.Source: FYI: You're way too loud. Maybe tone it down? Yes, you.
String.Dest: FYI: You're way too loud. Maybe tone it down? Yes, you.

String.Source: To our beloved neighbor: We'd love you to not be our neighbor. Consider moving, or decreasing the volume on, well, your entire life. Signed - Serenity Now
String.Dest: To our beloved neighbor: We'd love you to not be our neighbor. Consider moving, or decreasing the volume on, well, your entire life. Signed - Serenity Now

String.Source: Today. Tomorrow. Any day in the future. You will always be amazing.
String.Dest: Today. Tomorrow. Any day in the future. You will always be amazing.

String.Source: Remember to live life to the fullest. Don't waste those hours in front of the computer, go spend some time enjoying the world outside your window.
String.Dest: Remember to live life to the fullest. Don't waste those hours in front of the computer, go spend some time enjoying the world outside your window.

String.Source: Come knocking on our door anytime, we'd love to get to know our neighbors better.
String.Dest: Come knocking on our door anytime, we'd love to get to know our neighbors better.

String.Source: Dear Casanova: We get it. Like an apartment with a broken air conditioner, you're in heat. While in the throes of...whatever it is you're doing, consider the rest of our ears and mental imagery. Please be gross, more quietly.
String.Dest: Dear Casanova: We get it. Like an apartment with a broken air conditioner, you're in heat. While in the throes of...whatever it is you're doing, consider the rest of our ears and mental imagery. Please be gross, more quietly.

String.Source: Dear neighbor: These walls are thin, though maybe not as thin as your inhibitions? Please calm the volume on your love life, or at the very least sell tickets. Trust me, we're unfortunately all in attendance.
String.Dest: Dear neighbor: These walls are thin, though maybe not as thin as your inhibitions? Please calm the volume on your love life, or at the very least sell tickets. Trust me, we're unfortunately all in attendance.

String.Source: Dear Neighbor: We know a great real estate agent. Should we pass your number along to her? We'd love to see you leave.
String.Dest: Dear Neighbor: We know a great real estate agent. Should we pass your number along to her? We'd love to see you leave.

String.Source: I remember the last time I thought to myself, "Wow, I wish my neighbors would play their music louder." Oh wait! I never thought that!
String.Dest: I remember the last time I thought to myself, "Wow, I wish my neighbors would play their music louder." Oh wait! I never thought that!

String.Source: What a perfect photo-op! Holding the future of society in {M0.his}{F0.her} arms while the proud family looks on, {0.SimFirstName} is the quintessential portrait of a caring, community-focused politician.
String.Dest: What a perfect photo-op! Holding the future of society in {M0.his}{F0.her} arms while the proud family looks on, {0.SimFirstName} is the quintessential portrait of a caring, community-focused politician.

String.Source: Oddly, Bubble Blowers are not for Kids
String.Dest: Oddly, Bubble Blowers are not for Kids

String.Source: There are not enough Living Chairs to do this.
String.Dest: There are not enough Living Chairs to do this.

String.Source: Glass, steel, and the hottest trends characterize the hip and youthful Fashion District. What’s trendy right now? Karaoke and Asian cuisine!
String.Dest: Glass, steel, and the hottest trends characterize the hip and youthful Fashion District. What’s trendy right now? Karaoke and Asian cuisine!

String.Source: Tucked away from the hustle and the bustle of the city life are the magnificent Myshuno Meadows. With an outdoor bar, gorgeous wedding venue, and the scientific Star Garden, you’d be hard pressed not to find a way to spend a sunny afternoon in this iconic park.
String.Dest: Tucked away from the hustle and the bustle of the city life are the magnificent Myshuno Meadows. With an outdoor bar, gorgeous wedding venue, and the scientific Star Garden, you’d be hard pressed not to find a way to spend a sunny afternoon in this iconic park.

String.Source: High above the city, sandwiched between some of its most prominent buildings, lies the Uptown plaza - a monument to the rich and powerful. Bask in the glow of the outdoor fireplaces and take in that incredible view. Watch out for helicopters!
String.Dest: High above the city, sandwiched between some of its most prominent buildings, lies the Uptown plaza - a monument to the rich and powerful. Bask in the glow of the outdoor fireplaces and take in that incredible view. Watch out for helicopters!

String.Source: From musicians to painters, all artists feel at home in the free-spirited Arts Quarter. Join the fun by painting at a community easel or watching a street performance!
String.Dest: From musicians to painters, all artists feel at home in the free-spirited Arts Quarter. Join the fun by painting at a community easel or watching a street performance!

String.Source: While enjoying the salty ocean air, treat your tastebuds to a fiery adventure at any one of the Spice Market's regular food stalls! Local dishes here include Indian, Mexican, and Moroccan flavors as well as a tea stand to cleanse the palate.
String.Dest: While enjoying the salty ocean air, treat your tastebuds to a fiery adventure at any one of the Spice Market's regular food stalls! Local dishes here include Indian, Mexican, and Moroccan flavors as well as a tea stand to cleanse the palate.

String.Source: That circus was so marvelous! The clowns that would show up in between acts were absolutely hilarious. I almost had a bladder failure myself from laughter.
String.Dest: That circus was so marvelous! The clowns that would show up in between acts were absolutely hilarious. I almost had a bladder failure myself from laughter.

String.Source: The Circus was so exciting! My heart was pumping a mile a minute. I felt like the acrobats flipping over the spikes could have died at any moment!
String.Dest: The Circus was so exciting! My heart was pumping a mile a minute. I felt like the acrobats flipping over the spikes could have died at any moment!

String.Source: The Circus was okay. I felt like it was a rehash of the last one. It had some unique acts, but for the most part felt the same.
String.Dest: The Circus was okay. I felt like it was a rehash of the last one. It had some unique acts, but for the most part felt the same.

String.Source: That circus was beautiful. I never knew people could be so flexible. The contortionists and acrobats were the best part!
String.Dest: That circus was beautiful. I never knew people could be so flexible. The contortionists and acrobats were the best part!

String.Source: That Circus was amazing! People were dressed so elegantly and the lights and sounds were so mesmerizing.
String.Dest: That Circus was amazing! People were dressed so elegantly and the lights and sounds were so mesmerizing.

String.Source: The Evil Beavers concert was so good. They played all my favorite songs. Even some from their Bucktooth Cavern album.
String.Dest: The Evil Beavers concert was so good. They played all my favorite songs. Even some from their Bucktooth Cavern album.

String.Source: I am so glad I went to the Michele Bunch concert. Her voice is beautiful. We sat so close I was able to see the whites in her eyes!
String.Dest: I am so glad I went to the Michele Bunch concert. Her voice is beautiful. We sat so close I was able to see the whites in her eyes!

String.Source: The Swinging Oliphants put on the most insane concert! At one point they had the singer ride out on a huge electronic elephant singing their hit song, No Fools get Paid!
String.Dest: The Swinging Oliphants put on the most insane concert! At one point they had the singer ride out on a huge electronic elephant singing their hit song, No Fools get Paid!

String.Source: The Hans Brodenhime concert was absolutely electric. He spun the most insane tracks. At one point he dropped the beat and the crowd EXPLODED!
String.Dest: The Hans Brodenhime concert was absolutely electric. He spun the most insane tracks. At one point he dropped the beat and the crowd EXPLODED!

String.Source: The Frozen Banana Emporium knows how to put on a great concert. Bret and Jemaine have the best dynamic. Their concert has the best combination of comedy and great music.
String.Dest: The Frozen Banana Emporium knows how to put on a great concert. Bret and Jemaine have the best dynamic. Their concert has the best combination of comedy and great music.

String.Source: The Opera was such a beautiful experience. Joey Botticelli has one of the most amazing voices I have ever heard in my life!
String.Dest: The Opera was such a beautiful experience. Joey Botticelli has one of the most amazing voices I have ever heard in my life!

String.Source: Yaaaawwwwnnn operas are not really my thing. I can appreciate them, but it is not the most exhilarating experience.
String.Dest: Yaaaawwwwnnn operas are not really my thing. I can appreciate them, but it is not the most exhilarating experience.

String.Source: I am so happy I was able to attend Bob Pancakes and the 4 Goths Opera. It was so beautiful that everyone gave it a standing ovation at the end.
String.Dest: I am so happy I was able to attend Bob Pancakes and the 4 Goths Opera. It was so beautiful that everyone gave it a standing ovation at the end.

String.Source: The Seven Butlers Opera was enjoyable, but I would not recommend it to my friends. I almost fell asleep towards the end.
String.Dest: The Seven Butlers Opera was enjoyable, but I would not recommend it to my friends. I almost fell asleep towards the end.

String.Source: Bravo...bravo...bravo. This was the most emotional opera I have ever experienced. I will absolutely recommend Kelly and Her Falling Stars to all of my friends.
String.Dest: Bravo...bravo...bravo. This was the most emotional opera I have ever experienced. I will absolutely recommend Kelly and Her Falling Stars to all of my friends.

String.Source: That play was phenomenal! Mark Kelly had such a beautiful performance. He totally deserves a Simmy!
String.Dest: That play was phenomenal! Mark Kelly had such a beautiful performance. He totally deserves a Simmy!

String.Source: I heard such good things about The Tale of 7 Doors. I do not think that the play lived up to all the hype. I enjoyed it, but I should not have had my expectations so high.
String.Dest: I heard such good things about The Tale of 7 Doors. I do not think that the play lived up to all the hype. I enjoyed it, but I should not have had my expectations so high.

String.Source: Willy and the Muffin Maker was one of the most inspiring performances I have seen in a long time. I would give it two thumbs up!
String.Dest: Willy and the Muffin Maker was one of the most inspiring performances I have seen in a long time. I would give it two thumbs up!

String.Source: Snuffy the Red Headed Pigeon was an atrocity of a play. I would never recommend it to anyone. I almost walked out.
String.Dest: Snuffy the Red Headed Pigeon was an atrocity of a play. I would never recommend it to anyone. I almost walked out.

String.Source: The Murder of 1313 21 Chic Street was such a terrifying performance. Who would have thought it was all a true story. I feel sorry for the poor saps that live in that apartment.
String.Dest: The Murder of 1313 21 Chic Street was such a terrifying performance. Who would have thought it was all a true story. I feel sorry for the poor saps that live in that apartment.

String.Dest: Read Guide Book About Arts Quarter

String.Source: Welcome to the waterside Spice Market, San Myshuno's oldest and most historical neighborhood. The original owners of the famous Spice Market Pufferfish Cannery lived on this very street! Once their products went global, they converted the original cannery into a very fine loft overlooking the waterfront. Their great-great grandchildren moved to Uptown shortly after the karaoke bar was built next door.
String.Dest: Welcome to the waterside Spice Market, San Myshuno's oldest and most historical neighborhood. The original owners of the famous Spice Market Pufferfish Cannery lived on this very street! Once their products went global, they converted the original cannery into a very fine loft overlooking the waterfront. Their great-great grandchildren moved to Uptown shortly after the karaoke bar was built next door.

String.Source: The Spice Market is overflowing with family virtues and a sense of community. You can see it in the local art peppering the sidewalks and buildings. Add your own stamp of creativity to Spice Market by helping to paint a sidewalk mural.
String.Dest: The Spice Market is overflowing with family virtues and a sense of community. You can see it in the local art peppering the sidewalks and buildings. Add your own stamp of creativity to Spice Market by helping to paint a sidewalk mural.

String.Source: Uptown has become the heart of political discourse in San Myshuno. Stop by the public forum and listen to a politician’s speech, or better yet, give a speech of your own. Don’t be surprised if you see some unruly activists!
String.Dest: Uptown has become the heart of political discourse in San Myshuno. Stop by the public forum and listen to a politician’s speech, or better yet, give a speech of your own. Don’t be surprised if you see some unruly activists!

String.Source: Be sure to stop by the Arts Quarter every other Monday night for the Humor and Hijinks Festival. Tell some jokes, pull some pranks, and purchase one-of-a-kind fireworks and clothing at the Swag stall.
String.Dest: Be sure to stop by the Arts Quarter every other Monday night for the Humor and Hijinks Festival. Tell some jokes, pull some pranks, and purchase one-of-a-kind fireworks and clothing at the Swag stall.

String.Source: Cockroaches in your apartment getting you down? Forget how gross bugs can be for just a moment when you take a relaxing stroll in the Myshuno Meadows Butterfly Sanctuary.
String.Dest: Cockroaches in your apartment getting you down? Forget how gross bugs can be for just a moment when you take a relaxing stroll in the Myshuno Meadows Butterfly Sanctuary.

String.Source: There’s lots to do in the Arts Quarter! Take a stroll around the sculpture pond, look for local street art on the sides of the buildings, or add your own artistic flair to the neighborhood by painting a mural on the street.
String.Dest: There’s lots to do in the Arts Quarter! Take a stroll around the sculpture pond, look for local street art on the sides of the buildings, or add your own artistic flair to the neighborhood by painting a mural on the street.

String.Source: Nothing says “Uptown” quite like the local gourmet food stalls. Everyone raves about the Moroccan and New American stalls, but you haven’t lived until you’ve had a treat from the Uptown Cupcake stall!
String.Dest: Nothing says “Uptown” quite like the local gourmet food stalls. Everyone raves about the Moroccan and New American stalls, but you haven’t lived until you’ve had a treat from the Uptown Cupcake stall!

String.Source: Did you know that the Fashion District is home to the world-famous Torendi Tower? Take a gander and marvel at the decadence of the most expensive penthouse lot in San Myshuno.
String.Dest: Did you know that the Fashion District is home to the world-famous Torendi Tower? Take a gander and marvel at the decadence of the most expensive penthouse lot in San Myshuno.

String.Source: The Fashion District hosts not one, but two street festivals! Find love at the Romance Festival every other Saturday, or stop by every other Tuesday to get your geek on at GeekCon.
String.Dest: The Fashion District hosts not one, but two street festivals! Find love at the Romance Festival every other Saturday, or stop by every other Tuesday to get your geek on at GeekCon.

String.Source: Welcome to Myshuno Meadows! Kindly refrain from feeding the raccoons.
String.Dest: Welcome to Myshuno Meadows! Kindly refrain from feeding the raccoons.

String.Dest: Allows Sims to sing with computer-assisted precision

String.Source: Barging in here, but don't mind me. We are practically best friends, right? I am the best neighbor around. Not sure why all the other neighbors are avoiding me...
String.Dest: Barging in here, but don't mind me. We are practically best friends, right? I am the best neighbor around. Not sure why all the other neighbors are avoiding me...

String.Source: Ahoy Neighbor! I'm really enjoying access to your place. Got anything to eat? Can I just hang out here for a few?
String.Dest: Ahoy Neighbor! I'm really enjoying access to your place. Got anything to eat? Can I just hang out here for a few?

String.Source: Squeezing through the door here. Thanks for letting me invite myself in. I am so glad you are home. Want to hang out? Even if you don't I'll stay here for bit. Thanks, you are the best.
String.Dest: Squeezing through the door here. Thanks for letting me invite myself in. I am so glad you are home. Want to hang out? Even if you don't I'll stay here for bit. Thanks, you are the best.

String.Source: Stay cool and don't make a scene. The bribe went as expected...into your pocket. Enjoy the sweet profits of graft!
String.Dest: Stay cool and don't make a scene. The bribe went as expected...into your pocket. Enjoy the sweet profits of graft!

String.Source: Hear About Light Tea Effects from {1.SimFirstName}
String.Dest: Hear About Light Tea Effects from {1.SimFirstName}

String.Source: On this spot the Llama Freedom Movement was born. A simple protest, known as the Llamoid Sit-In, shocked the public with its extreme use of acoustic guitars, hair flowers and slightly tuneless singing. Though many years have passed since that day, the spirit of activism remains alive and well, and will continue until all Llamas are free to strut and spit and neck wrestle to their heart's content. (Plaque paid for by the Llamean Popular People's Front)
String.Dest: On this spot the Llama Freedom Movement was born. A simple protest, known as the Llamoid Sit-In, shocked the public with its extreme use of acoustic guitars, hair flowers and slightly tuneless singing. Though many years have passed since that day, the spirit of activism remains alive and well, and will continue until all Llamas are free to strut and spit and neck wrestle to their heart's content. (Plaque paid for by the Llamean Popular People's Front)

String.Source: This monument marks the spot where noted eccentric 'Emperor' Horton experienced the cities' first Death by Pufferfish. (Plaque donated by Stove Makers Against Sushi Association)
String.Dest: This monument marks the spot where noted eccentric 'Emperor' Horton experienced the cities' first Death by Pufferfish. (Plaque donated by Stove Makers Against Sushi Association)

String.Source: This Park was once the estate of scientist and herring baron Barnabas Skye. After his mansion was gutted by fire, the fish mogul gifted his extensive gardens to the people on the proviso that his personal Observatory remain standing and free of use to any budding astronomer living in the city. To this day the telescope is maintained and updated by the Barnabassian Scientific Society.
String.Dest: This Park was once the estate of scientist and herring baron Barnabas Skye. After his mansion was gutted by fire, the fish mogul gifted his extensive gardens to the people on the proviso that his personal Observatory remain standing and free of use to any budding astronomer living in the city. To this day the telescope is maintained and updated by the Barnabassian Scientific Society.

String.Source: Raised in memory of the Open Street Act, legislation which allowed communities of all cultures to organize celebrations in the streets. The progressive vision of our founding fathers has allowed generations of residents enjoy the many delights that 'Festival City' has to offer. (Plaque donated by DynaSign Co. 'If it's in the streets, it's on our Signs' (TM))
String.Dest: Raised in memory of the Open Street Act, legislation which allowed communities of all cultures to organize celebrations in the streets. The progressive vision of our founding fathers has allowed generations of residents enjoy the many delights that 'Festival City' has to offer. (Plaque donated by DynaSign Co. 'If it's in the streets, it's on our Signs' (TM))

String.Source: This Plaque was erected to mark 150 years of fishery in our fine city. From the humble kedgeree peddlers of the gold rush era to the mighty height of the Canning Industry, the noble Spangled Herring (Clupea Pallasii Fabulousa) has been the slippery, silvery key to the fortunes of this city. As we step into a bold new century, let us not forget the bounty of the sea, nor the piscine origins of our metropolis.
String.Dest: This Plaque was erected to mark 150 years of fishery in our fine city. From the humble kedgeree peddlers of the gold rush era to the mighty height of the Canning Industry, the noble Spangled Herring (Clupea Pallasii Fabulousa) has been the slippery, silvery key to the fortunes of this city. As we step into a bold new century, let us not forget the bounty of the sea, nor the piscine origins of our metropolis.

String.Source: This plaque commemorates the Shirt Factory Meteor Strike And Subsequent Big Lizard Incident that razed the Fashion District to ash. Like a phoenix reborn, the District has risen from this disaster to become an exemplar of regeneration, with award winning modern architecture and a vibrant festival scene.
String.Dest: This plaque commemorates the Shirt Factory Meteor Strike And Subsequent Big Lizard Incident that razed the Fashion District to ash. Like a phoenix reborn, the District has risen from this disaster to become an exemplar of regeneration, with award winning modern architecture and a vibrant festival scene.

String.Source: Welcome to the city! Every day is an adventure on the streets of San Myshuno. From the wild personalities you might run into on the streets to the element of surprise of stumbling across a festival in action, there's something new to discover!
String.Dest: Welcome to the city! Every day is an adventure on the streets of San Myshuno. From the wild personalities you might run into on the streets to the element of surprise of stumbling across a festival in action, there's something new to discover!

String.Source: The Landlord. Pay the rent on time and you'll have no problems.
String.Dest: The Landlord. Pay the rent on time and you'll have no problems.

String.Source: As a reward for your generous tip, you have unlocked metallic face paint, a hat, and a full body outfit for both a cowboy and an astronaut. Wearing all three pieces for either costume will give your Sim the self-interaction to Busk for Tips!
String.Dest: As a reward for your generous tip, you have unlocked metallic face paint, a hat, and a full body outfit for both a cowboy and an astronaut. Wearing all three pieces for either costume will give your Sim the self-interaction to Busk for Tips!

String.Source: It’s a Karaoke Contest night at the Karaoke Bar! Sims can test their silky singing skills by selecting Sing in Karaoke Contest on any of the Karaoke Machines in the building. The winner will be announced at 11pm, so make sure to sing before then!
String.Dest: It’s a Karaoke Contest night at the Karaoke Bar! Sims can test their silky singing skills by selecting Sing in Karaoke Contest on any of the Karaoke Machines in the building. The winner will be announced at 11pm, so make sure to sing before then!

String.Dest: Tuning into {M0.his}{F0.her} favorite talk show was a big surprise when {0.SimFirstName} found out that they were being mocked by the host. {0.SimFirstName} isn't happy about being portrayed this way, but now {M0.he}{F0.she} has to decide how to respond to the criticism.

String.Source: Ohh no! Someone has been posting all over the internet about the new content for {0.SimFirstName}'s game. Users are talking everywhere about it, and it's time for {0.SimFirstName} to step in and fix it.
String.Dest: Ohh no! Someone has been posting all over the internet about the new content for {0.SimFirstName}'s game. Users are talking everywhere about it, and it's time for {0.SimFirstName} to step in and fix it.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} is excited for the next upcoming game that {M0.his}{F0.her} company will be releasing. {M0.He}{F0.She} has been asked to create the announcement message and now {M0.he}{F0.she} has to decide what type of message to craft.
