String.Source: A big celebrity is coming into {0.SimFirstName}'s studio and {M0.he}{F0.she} has been asked to fill the dressing room with items that the celebrity requested. {0.SimFirstName} starts to gather the items when {M0.he}{F0.she} gets to a request for coffee that has 20 steps.
String.Dest: A big celebrity is coming into {0.SimFirstName}'s studio and {M0.he}{F0.she} has been asked to fill the dressing room with items that the celebrity requested. {0.SimFirstName} starts to gather the items when {M0.he}{F0.she} gets to a request for coffee that has 20 steps.

String.Source: Someone just won't stop yelling on the forums. They hate {0.SimFirstName}'s company for leaving out the PvP part of their game's sequel, and they just wont stop talking. {0.SimFirstName} has decided it's time for {M0.him}{F0.her} to step in and say something.
String.Dest: Someone just won't stop yelling on the forums. They hate {0.SimFirstName}'s company for leaving out the PvP part of their game's sequel, and they just wont stop talking. {0.SimFirstName} has decided it's time for {M0.him}{F0.her} to step in and say something.

String.Source: It's that time again to start scheduling magazine interviews for {0.SimFirstName}'s upcoming game. {M0.He}{F0.She} has been asked by multiple companies to do an exclusive interview with them, but {0.SimFirstName} isn't sure who to choose.
String.Dest: It's that time again to start scheduling magazine interviews for {0.SimFirstName}'s upcoming game. {M0.He}{F0.She} has been asked by multiple companies to do an exclusive interview with them, but {0.SimFirstName} isn't sure who to choose.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} was asked to participate in a publicity stunt at the next conference {M0.his}{F0.her} company will be presenting at. {0.SimFirstName} isn't sure how {M0.he}{F0.she} feels about this...
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} was asked to participate in a publicity stunt at the next conference {M0.his}{F0.her} company will be presenting at. {0.SimFirstName} isn't sure how {M0.he}{F0.she} feels about this...

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} found a video of someone falling into a pool and clicked the reblog button, because it was too funny not to share. It only took about 5 seconds for {0.SimFirstName} to realize that {M0.he}{F0.she} posted it to the company account instead of {M0.his}{F0.her} personal one.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} found a video of someone falling into a pool and clicked the reblog button, because it was too funny not to share. It only took about 5 seconds for {0.SimFirstName} to realize that {M0.he}{F0.she} posted it to the company account instead of {M0.his}{F0.her} personal one.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName}'s rival company made the foolish decision to cancel their most popular show. Now it's up to {0.SimPronounObjective} to decide if {M0.his}{F0.her} company should do something about this travesty.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName}'s rival company made the foolish decision to cancel their most popular show. Now it's up to {0.SimPronounObjective} to decide if {M0.his}{F0.her} company should do something about this travesty.

String.Source: No! A big celebrity couple has decided to get a divorce. Unfortunately {0.SimFirstName} represents them both, how is {M0.he}{F0.she} supposed to deal with this?
String.Dest: No! A big celebrity couple has decided to get a divorce. Unfortunately {0.SimFirstName} represents them both, how is {M0.he}{F0.she} supposed to deal with this?

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} reaches for the door to the meeting, only to trip on one of the company's faulty power cables snaking out from under the door. {0.SimFirstName} causes a ruckus and is escorted out by hotel security!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} reaches for the door to the meeting, only to trip on one of the company's faulty power cables snaking out from under the door. {0.SimFirstName} causes a ruckus and is escorted out by hotel security!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} bursts through the doors just as hotel security catches up, with just enough time to expose the Megacorp's CEO as a criminal. The board thanks {0.SimFirstName} for {M0.his}{F0.her} boldness and honesty.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} bursts through the doors just as hotel security catches up, with just enough time to expose the Megacorp's CEO as a criminal. The board thanks {0.SimFirstName} for {M0.his}{F0.her} boldness and honesty.

String.Source: Unfortunately, {0.SimFirstName} submitted their own credit card to pay for the food, so the executives ate well at {0.SimFirstName}'s expense!
String.Dest: Unfortunately, {0.SimFirstName} submitted their own credit card to pay for the food, so the executives ate well at {0.SimFirstName}'s expense!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} lists the potential accomplishments of the candidate, but the sheer weight of the campaign collapses on them like a weight of bricks and the entire speech is cancelled!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} lists the potential accomplishments of the candidate, but the sheer weight of the campaign collapses on them like a weight of bricks and the entire speech is cancelled!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} deftly lists the key points of the candidate's platform and reminds them of the good work they can, no, must do for the people. The candidate straightens their buttons and heads out to the podium to a roaring crowd!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} deftly lists the key points of the candidate's platform and reminds them of the good work they can, no, must do for the people. The candidate straightens their buttons and heads out to the podium to a roaring crowd!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} gives their candidate a dressing down, but this only sends the fragile candidate into a spiral of doubt. The crowd grows restless and begins booing the candidate, harming the whole campaign!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} gives their candidate a dressing down, but this only sends the fragile candidate into a spiral of doubt. The crowd grows restless and begins booing the candidate, harming the whole campaign!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} simultaneously plays good cop and bad cop to whip their candidate into shape. The candidate's resolve steeled, they dramatically step onto the stage to the roar of the crowd.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} simultaneously plays good cop and bad cop to whip their candidate into shape. The candidate's resolve steeled, they dramatically step onto the stage to the roar of the crowd.

String.Source: Desperate for justice, {0.SimFirstName} offers a modest bribe to the nearest public defender within earshot. Unfortunately, the defender is an undercover cop! {0.SimFirstName} may regret this!
String.Dest: Desperate for justice, {0.SimFirstName} offers a modest bribe to the nearest public defender within earshot. Unfortunately, the defender is an undercover cop! {0.SimFirstName} may regret this!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} begins loudly singing the chant of the local sports team. The judge, a no-nonsense arbitrator, has {0.SimFirstName} put in jail for public annoyance and the legal proceeding proceeds as planned. Oh no!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} begins loudly singing the chant of the local sports team. The judge, a no-nonsense arbitrator, has {0.SimFirstName} put in jail for public annoyance and the legal proceeding proceeds as planned. Oh no!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} quickly faints in the middle of the court room. The bailiff rushes to their aid and the judge calls for an immediate recess. {0.SimFirstName} winks at their client, having bought them a little more time to find a solution.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} quickly faints in the middle of the court room. The bailiff rushes to their aid and the judge calls for an immediate recess. {0.SimFirstName} winks at their client, having bought them a little more time to find a solution.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} frantically opens the circuit box and begins yanking and connecting wires with abandon. The lights flicker for a minute, then {0.SimFirstName} lights up like a Christmas tree as electricity surges through their body. A shocking rally, to be sure!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} frantically opens the circuit box and begins yanking and connecting wires with abandon. The lights flicker for a minute, then {0.SimFirstName} lights up like a Christmas tree as electricity surges through their body. A shocking rally, to be sure!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} bravely yanks open the circuit box and makes a guess as to which wire goes where. Miraculously, after a terrifying pause and a light hum, the lights come on and the speakers return to full brilliance. The Rally is saved!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} bravely yanks open the circuit box and makes a guess as to which wire goes where. Miraculously, after a terrifying pause and a light hum, the lights come on and the speakers return to full brilliance. The Rally is saved!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} tugs a poster off the wall in the hopes of building an improvised megaphone. Unfortunately, this leads to a disastrous chain reaction where the entire back wall falls over, permanently derailing the rally.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} tugs a poster off the wall in the hopes of building an improvised megaphone. Unfortunately, this leads to a disastrous chain reaction where the entire back wall falls over, permanently derailing the rally.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} dives just off the stage to grab an enormous poster from a front row patron. Pulling duct tape from {M0.his}{F0.her} pocket, {M0.he}{F0.she} quickly improvises a megaphone, which {M0.he}{F0.she} hands to the speaker. The crowd quickly calms down and the rally proceeds in darkness.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} dives just off the stage to grab an enormous poster from a front row patron. Pulling duct tape from {M0.his}{F0.her} pocket, {M0.he}{F0.she} quickly improvises a megaphone, which {M0.he}{F0.she} hands to the speaker. The crowd quickly calms down and the rally proceeds in darkness.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} calls the neighboring office to ask for help. However, the vile secretary gets back at {M0.him}{F0.her} for stealing a parking spot earlier in the week and hangs up the phone. Having wasted all that time, the deadline is missed.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} calls the neighboring office to ask for help. However, the vile secretary gets back at {M0.him}{F0.her} for stealing a parking spot earlier in the week and hangs up the phone. Having wasted all that time, the deadline is missed.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} approaches the neighboring office and pleas for help. Seeing the sincerity in {M0.his}{F0.her}'s voice, they join the cause and add their phones to the effort. The money is raised in no time!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} approaches the neighboring office and pleas for help. Seeing the sincerity in {M0.his}{F0.her}'s voice, they join the cause and add their phones to the effort. The money is raised in no time!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} crafts a sign and heads down to the street. Right as {M0.he}{F0.she} begins asking for money, a boisterous parade passes by, recruiting all pedestrians. Outmatched, {0.SimFirstName} returns to the office in defeat.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} crafts a sign and heads down to the street. Right as {M0.he}{F0.she} begins asking for money, a boisterous parade passes by, recruiting all pedestrians. Outmatched, {0.SimFirstName} returns to the office in defeat.

String.Source: "We must take it to the streets!" cries {0.SimFirstName}. The entire office makes signs and heads to the busy street to plead their case and raise money. The face-to-face interaction moves hearts and minds and the money is raised almost instantly!
String.Dest: "We must take it to the streets!" cries {0.SimFirstName}. The entire office makes signs and heads to the busy street to plead their case and raise money. The face-to-face interaction moves hearts and minds and the money is raised almost instantly!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} licks their lips and dials the local newspaper to spill the beans. Sadly, the headline the next day reveals {0.SimFirstName} to be a weasel -- the meeting was about raising money for charity!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} licks their lips and dials the local newspaper to spill the beans. Sadly, the headline the next day reveals {0.SimFirstName} to be a weasel -- the meeting was about raising money for charity!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} dials the lobbyist later in the day to inquire about their policies and plans. It turns out, the politician is a major ally of {0.SimFirstName}'s policies and explains the rumors. A new partnership is born!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} dials the lobbyist later in the day to inquire about their policies and plans. It turns out, the politician is a major ally of {0.SimFirstName}'s policies and explains the rumors. A new partnership is born!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} organizes {M0.his}{F0.her} staff and runs across the street to the local farmer's market to buy literally every vegetable. {M0.He}{F0.She} hurries the food back and quickly prepare scrumptious vegetarian cuisine to delight all donors and saves the dinner.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} organizes {M0.his}{F0.her} staff and runs across the street to the local farmer's market to buy literally every vegetable. {M0.He}{F0.She} hurries the food back and quickly prepare scrumptious vegetarian cuisine to delight all donors and saves the dinner.

String.Source: Just as the ice cream is wheeled in, the air conditioner fails in the building and everything begins to melt. Without vegetables, and the ice cream melting, {0.SimFirstName} has to face the music and the donors, all of whom leave with empty bellies and full wallets. Drat!
String.Dest: Just as the ice cream is wheeled in, the air conditioner fails in the building and everything begins to melt. Without vegetables, and the ice cream melting, {0.SimFirstName} has to face the music and the donors, all of whom leave with empty bellies and full wallets. Drat!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} calls a nearby Ice Cream Delivery service and orders 2 of every flavor. The Donor Dinner shifts from Dinner to Dessert Fracas to the delight of every donor. The money raised exceeds expectations.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} calls a nearby Ice Cream Delivery service and orders 2 of every flavor. The Donor Dinner shifts from Dinner to Dessert Fracas to the delight of every donor. The money raised exceeds expectations.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} begins stating {M0.his}{F0.her} client's campaign promises, but is quickly cut off. The donors state they're looking to back someone who wants to improve the future, not focus on the past. They leave without donating.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} begins stating {M0.his}{F0.her} client's campaign promises, but is quickly cut off. The donors state they're looking to back someone who wants to improve the future, not focus on the past. They leave without donating.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} takes a deep breath and succinctly lists {M0.his}{F0.her} client's three best achievements. The donors think on it, then nod and break out their check books.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} takes a deep breath and succinctly lists {M0.his}{F0.her} client's three best achievements. The donors think on it, then nod and break out their check books.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} begins stating {M0.his}{F0.her} client's campaign promises, but is quickly cut short. The donors state they aren't interested in promises, only actual results from the past.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} begins stating {M0.his}{F0.her} client's campaign promises, but is quickly cut short. The donors state they aren't interested in promises, only actual results from the past.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} takes a deep breath and boldly states {M0.his}{F0.her} client's three boldest campaign promises. The donors react with excitement and immediately break out their check books to donate.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} takes a deep breath and boldly states {M0.his}{F0.her} client's three boldest campaign promises. The donors react with excitement and immediately break out their check books to donate.

String.Source: "Tofu everything," shouts {0.SimFirstName}. The unquestioning staff quickly tofus everything. One by one the celebrities file in and are delighted at the sheer quantity of tofu. The conversation has begun on a good note!
String.Dest: "Tofu everything," shouts {0.SimFirstName}. The unquestioning staff quickly tofus everything. One by one the celebrities file in and are delighted at the sheer quantity of tofu. The conversation has begun on a good note!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} walks up to the first celebrity to arrive and begins their spiel. "Tonight, we're going to feast on a meal for the mind!" The celebrity is hungry, not amused, and quickly leaves for a cooler event.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} walks up to the first celebrity to arrive and begins their spiel. "Tonight, we're going to feast on a meal for the mind!" The celebrity is hungry, not amused, and quickly leaves for a cooler event.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} makes an elaborate presentation of the descriptive and imaginary foods. The celebrities, all artists, squeal with delight at the jest and clap with glee. The conversation immediately shifts to supporting the charity.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} makes an elaborate presentation of the descriptive and imaginary foods. The celebrities, all artists, squeal with delight at the jest and clap with glee. The conversation immediately shifts to supporting the charity.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} explains why telling the truth is the best way to win over people, but the professor guffaws and cuts them short. "Truth is a relic of the old world," they explain. {0.SimFirstName} shrinks into their chair.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} explains why telling the truth is the best way to win over people, but the professor guffaws and cuts them short. "Truth is a relic of the old world," they explain. {0.SimFirstName} shrinks into their chair.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} explains why telling the truth is the best way to win over people. The professor nods, and responds simply "that is correct."
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} explains why telling the truth is the best way to win over people. The professor nods, and responds simply "that is correct."

String.Source: "Schmooze 'em!" shouts {0.SimFirstName}. The professor cheers and presses a button. Money falls down from the ceiling like a game show.
String.Dest: "Schmooze 'em!" shouts {0.SimFirstName}. The professor cheers and presses a button. Money falls down from the ceiling like a game show.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} asks {M0.his}{F0.her} boss about the donation, which results in disappointment. "Thanks for ruining the surprise, nosey!" the boss exclaims. Whoops!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} asks {M0.his}{F0.her} boss about the donation, which results in disappointment. "Thanks for ruining the surprise, nosey!" the boss exclaims. Whoops!

String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} emails the accountant, who digs in and discovers a sister organization is laundering money! {0.SimFirstName} alerts the authorities and receives an award for {M0.his}{F0.her} honesty.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} whistles non-chalantly and drops the report exposing the donation into {M0.his}{F0.her} waste bin. Suddenly, {M0.his}{F0.her} boss calls {0.SimPronounObjective} in, demanding to know everything about it. The meeting does not go well!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} whistles non-chalantly and drops the report exposing the donation into {M0.his}{F0.her} waste bin. Suddenly, {M0.his}{F0.her} boss calls {0.SimPronounObjective} in, demanding to know everything about it. The meeting does not go well!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} whistles non-chalantly and drops the report exposing the donation into {M0.his}{F0.her} waste bin. Suddenly, an underling calls to report a large donation was just deposited from the government. See, everything worked out.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} calls the politician's office, but is immediately put on hold. After 2 hours, {M0.he}{F0.she} realizes {M0.he}{F0.she}'ll never be patched through, and try to recoup {M0.his}{F0.her} lost productivity unsuccessfully.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} tucks the card away, not wanting to disturb the politician. Upon mentioning the opportunity to {M0.his}{F0.her} boss later, {0.SimFirstName} is chastised for failing to take advantage of the opportunity.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} tucks the card away, not wanting to disturb the politician. Upon mentioning the opportunity to {M0.his}{F0.her} boss later, {0.SimFirstName} is chastised for failing to take advantage of the opportunity.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} begins shaming the political apparatus for their lack of support, but is met with tepid silence. {0.SimFirstName}'s tactics fly in the face of the status quo and {M0.he}{F0.she}'ll need to evaluate {M0.his}{F0.her} position.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} taps the mic, then launches into a bold call for political support for the eradication of the worldwide disease. The conference is picked up immediately by news agencies and politicians begin dialing {0.SimFirstName}'s office in droves!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} taps the mic, then launches into a bold call for political support for the eradication of the worldwide disease. The conference is picked up immediately by news agencies and politicians begin dialing {0.SimFirstName}'s office in droves!

String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} grabs the phone, kicks {M0.his}{F0.her} feet on the desk, and begins calling politicians one by one. After a few hours, support is rallied, and the political support begins appearing in the halls of influence around the world. The cause may be won!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} grabs a broom from the municipal supply closet and begins cleaning the streets in front of the office. Before long, other citizens join in and the block is soon immaculate. "This is only the beginning!" {0.SimFirstName} cries.

String.Source: "Hello citizen!" cheers {0.SimFirstName}. "Give it a break, buddy!" exclaims the frustrated person. {0.SimFirstName} stands by, confused at how {M0.his}{F0.her} good natured gesture could fail so spectacularly.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} walks down the street to address citizens who look troubled. Many simply want their voices heard, and {0.SimFirstName}'s assurances seem to lift spirits. It isn't much, but it's a start.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} walks down the street to address citizens who look troubled. Many simply want their voices heard, and {0.SimFirstName}'s assurances seem to lift spirits. It isn't much, but it's a start.

String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} stands at the podium, takes a deep breath, and exposes the scandal uncovered in {M0.his}{F0.her} office. The press erupts in questions, but the clatter quickly dies down as they see {0.SimFirstName} is telling the truth. Things immediately improve!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} simply ignores the scandal, but is ambushed on {M0.his}{F0.her} way to the bathroom by an army of reporters. Ashamed, and unable to reach the bathroom, {0.SimFirstName} experiences a prickly work "accident."
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} simply ignores the scandal, but is ambushed on {M0.his}{F0.her} way to the bathroom by an army of reporters. Ashamed, and unable to reach the bathroom, {0.SimFirstName} experiences a prickly work "accident."

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} sends out a press release announcing free ice cream for bowlers who bowl a perfect game. The ruse works and the press, distracted, fails to uncover the scandal.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} sends out a press release announcing free ice cream for bowlers who bowl a perfect game. The ruse works and the press, distracted, fails to uncover the scandal.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} proposes a compromise to the leaders of both parties over coffee. Neither fully get what they want, but both agree the city needs to get moving again. After a handshake, {0.SimFirstName} proclaims the negotiated settlement.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} proposes a compromise to the leaders of both parties over coffee. Neither fully get what they want, but both agree the city needs to get moving again. After a handshake, {0.SimFirstName} proclaims the negotiated settlement.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} begins yelling at the two opposed parties. Instead of remaining opposed, they team up to oppose {0.SimFirstName}! It seems more flies are attracted with honey instead of vinegar!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} begins yelling at the two opposed parties. Instead of remaining opposed, they team up to oppose {0.SimFirstName}! It seems more flies are attracted with honey instead of vinegar!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} slams {M0.his}{F0.her} fist on the table and demands the two aggravated parties agree to a solution. After some grumbling, both begin talking, instead of shouting, and before long, a solution is reached. Finally!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} slams {M0.his}{F0.her} fist on the table and demands the two aggravated parties agree to a solution. After some grumbling, both begin talking, instead of shouting, and before long, a solution is reached. Finally!

String.Source: "And this is for you," says {0.SimFirstName}. {M0.His}{F0.Her} fellow council member stands up, shocked, and leaves the room in disgust. It seems gift giving was the wrong approach!
String.Dest: "And this is for you," says {0.SimFirstName}. {M0.His}{F0.Her} fellow council member stands up, shocked, and leaves the room in disgust. It seems gift giving was the wrong approach!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} makes several promises to {M0.his}{F0.her} fellow council members, but none of them come through when it comes time to vote. It seems empty promises don't make good gifts.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} makes several promises to {M0.his}{F0.her} fellow council members, but none of them come through when it comes time to vote. It seems empty promises don't make good gifts.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} meets with each council member to discuss their reason for wanting the bill, and agrees to back them when they too have similar bills. It seems coffee and a little sweet talk goes a long way on city council!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} meets with each council member to discuss their reason for wanting the bill, and agrees to back them when they too have similar bills. It seems coffee and a little sweet talk goes a long way on city council!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} gets to the pie crust segment of their speech, only to find the auditorium empty. The Free Robot Bird caucus went previously and is an impossible act to follow. The Free Pie motion fails.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} gets to the pie crust segment of their speech, only to find the auditorium empty. The Free Robot Bird caucus went previously and is an impossible act to follow. The Free Pie motion fails.

String.Source: "The citizenry needs free pie, and they needed it yesterday," says {0.SimFirstName} to uproarius applause. All the representatives gather to carry {0.SimFirstName} in triumph as the citizens will finally get their free pie.
String.Dest: "The citizenry needs free pie, and they needed it yesterday," says {0.SimFirstName} to uproarius applause. All the representatives gather to carry {0.SimFirstName} in triumph as the citizens will finally get their free pie.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} gets to the alloy beak segment of {M0.his}{F0.her} speech, only to find the auditorium empty. It's free pie! How is a speech supposed to compete with free pie?
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} gets to the alloy beak segment of {M0.his}{F0.her} speech, only to find the auditorium empty. It's free pie! How is a speech supposed to compete with free pie?

String.Source: "What is life without a robot bird to call one's own," asks {0.SimFirstName} to cheers. "And free!" they continue. {0.SimFirstName} is carried in triumph on the shoulder of {M0.his}{F0.her} peers through the legislature hall as the motion passes.
String.Dest: "What is life without a robot bird to call one's own," asks {0.SimFirstName} to cheers. "And free!" they continue. {0.SimFirstName} is carried in triumph on the shoulder of {M0.his}{F0.her} peers through the legislature hall as the motion passes.

String.Source:
"…and if my right-honorable peers will recall, the Sacred Sword --"
"That fiction stinks!" shouts a member of the opposition. "Yeah, boo!" shouts another. {0.SimFirstName} sits down, defeated.
String.Dest:
"…and if my right-honorable peers will recall, the Sacred Sword --"
"That fiction stinks!" shouts a member of the opposition. "Yeah, boo!" shouts another. {0.SimFirstName} sits down, defeated.

String.Source: "…and if my right-honorable peers will recall, the Sacred Sword of Saluminus was carried all the way to the mountain before --" "Enough!" shouts the opposition. "We won't vote!" {0.SimFirstName} collapses in exhaustion, successful in {M0.his}{F0.her} filibuster.
String.Dest: "…and if my right-honorable peers will recall, the Sacred Sword of Saluminus was carried all the way to the mountain before --" "Enough!" shouts the opposition. "We won't vote!" {0.SimFirstName} collapses in exhaustion, successful in {M0.his}{F0.her} filibuster.

String.Source:
"Pie is delicious, as you all know," states {0.SimFirstName}.
"Boo on pie," shouts the opposition. "Sit down! Cake is better." {0.SimFirstName} is defeated and sits without pie or political victory.
String.Dest:
"Pie is delicious, as you all know," states {0.SimFirstName}.
"Boo on pie," shouts the opposition. "Sit down! Cake is better." {0.SimFirstName} is defeated and sits without pie or political victory.

String.Source: "I think we can all agree pie is delicious," explains {0.SimFirstName} in {M0.his}{F0.her} filibuster speech. "The ingredients include… --""Madame Chairwoman, the opposition declines to vote. Please ask {0.SimFirstName} to sit down." Triumphant, {0.SimFirstName} collapses in delighted exhaustion.

"The ingredients include… --""Madame Chairwoman, the opposition declines to vote. Please ask {0.SimFirstName} to sit down." Triumphant, {0.SimFirstName} collapses in delighted exhaustion.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} works to cajole {M0.his}{F0.her} peers, but is met with stiff opposition. It seems that cajoling is no longer the tactic du jour and {0.SimFirstName}'s motion is defeated.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} hornswoggles like a master and is quickly rewarded with all the legislative support needed to pass {M0.his}{F0.her} motion. {M0.His}{F0.Her} legacy secure {0.SimFirstName} beams with pride.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} hornswoggles like a master and is quickly rewarded with all the legislative support needed to pass {M0.his}{F0.her} motion. {M0.His}{F0.Her} legacy secure {0.SimFirstName} beams with pride.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} helps clean up the mess, but without enough papers must return to the office early. The boss berates {M0.him}{F0.her}, and sends {0.SimFirstName} back out to deliver the papers late.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} helps clean up the mess, but without enough papers must return to the office early. The boss berates {M0.him}{F0.her}, and sends {0.SimFirstName} back out to deliver the papers late.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} offers to help clean up, and in the bustle swipes enough copies for the rest of {M0.his}{F0.her} route without being seen. When {M0.he}{F0.she} returns, {0.SimFirstName} see the other Paper Deliverer being fired for not finishing their route. That was a close one!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} shrugs and admits {M0.he}{F0.she} was distracted. The boss is annoyed, but understands, and thanks {0.SimFirstName} for the honesty, but also puts a mark on {M0.his}{F0.her} performance report.

"You didn't read this at all, did you?" {0.SimFirstName} admits the truth and leaves the office ashamed and chastised.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} digs into the rumor that city council is considering Sunday Parking Fees, and it's true! This is an outrage and {0.SimFirstName}'s piece will surely force the council to think twice, while {0.SimFirstName} enjoys a boost to {M0.his}{F0.her} writing prestige!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} calls the Department of Parking Enforcement to ask about unpainted zones being enforced. A short while later, thugs from the department paint "{0.SimFirstName} stinks!" on the office wall. Lame! {0.SimFirstName} is the laughing stock of the staff.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} calls the Department of Parking Enforcement to ask about unpainted zones being enforced. A short while later, thugs from the department paint "{0.SimFirstName} stinks!" on the office wall. Lame! {0.SimFirstName} is the laughing stock of the staff.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} calls the Department of Parking Enforcement to ask about unpainted zones being treated as painted zones. The official gives a fuzzy response, which {0.SimFirstName} catches on tape. Now, the department is reconsidering their position and {0.SimFirstName} is basking in the glory of the story.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} calls the Department of Parking Enforcement to ask about unpainted zones being treated as painted zones. The official gives a fuzzy response, which {0.SimFirstName} catches on tape. Now, the department is reconsidering their position and {0.SimFirstName} is basking in the glory of the story.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} gives an anonymous call to the Health Department. The restaurant is investigated and shut down quickly. The boss is angry there's no weekly article. But thankfully nobody got sick.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} gives an anonymous call to the Health Department. The restaurant is investigated and shut down quickly. The boss is angry there's no weekly article. But thankfully nobody got sick.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} writes a glowing article about the exquisite preparation and excellent flavors. Soon, the restaurant is the hottest thing in town, even if a few people get sick.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} writes a glowing article about the exquisite preparation and excellent flavors. Soon, the restaurant is the hottest thing in town, even if a few people get sick.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} carefully adds a bite of the odd substance to {M0.his}{F0.her} mouth and is immediately engulfed in a blast of flavor. "This is incredible!" exclaims {0.SimFirstName}. {M0.He}{F0.She} learned more about cooking by identifying the chef responsible!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} brushes off the vendor and steps to the side. Another passerby tries the food and draws a crowd after exclaiming "Eureka!" {0.SimFirstName} tries to get a sample, but is knocked down as the hordes of eager foodies draw in.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} turns up {M0.his}{F0.her} nose and declines the food. The waiter looks crestfallen, but steps to the side. "That dish tastes awful," says a peer to {0.SimFirstName}. "You just avoided an appointment with the toilet!"

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} writes a scathing review that's hotter than the tepid food served at the restaurant. The community reacts overwhelmingly favorable. Finally someone had the gumption to speak out!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} writes a scathing review that's hotter than the tepid food served at the restaurant. The community reacts overwhelmingly favorable. Finally someone had the gumption to speak out!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName}'s review is received as well as the food was delicious -- not well. Folks clamoring for an honest stinger feel let down and {0.SimFirstName}'s ratings plummet.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName}'s review is received as well as the food was delicious -- not well. Folks clamoring for an honest stinger feel let down and {0.SimFirstName}'s ratings plummet.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} writes a vague, but kind review of the restaurant that skirts the issues of actual food quality. The restaurant appreciates the kindness and sends {0.SimFirstName} a "tip" for the aid.

String.Dest: After aging up to Teen, {0.SimFirstName} will now be able to sing Jazz songs via the Piano, Guitar, and/or Microphone. {0.SimPronounSubjective} will also be able to sing Jazz songs by clicking on {0.SimPronounReflexive} and selecting Sing Song.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} can sing Jazz songs via the Piano, Guitar, and/or Microphone. {M0.He}{F0.She} is also able to sing Jazz songs by clicking on {M0.himself}{F0.herself} and selecting Sing Song.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} can sing Jazz songs via the Piano, Guitar, and/or Microphone. {M0.He}{F0.She} is also able to sing Jazz songs by clicking on {M0.himself}{F0.herself} and selecting Sing Song.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} has reached supreme singing status! Karaoke records will fall before {M0.his}{F0.her} awesome voice!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} has reached supreme singing status! Karaoke records will fall before {M0.his}{F0.her} awesome voice!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} can now sing Country songs and Duet Jazz songs on the Karaoke Machine, and can sing Pop songs via the Piano, Guitar, and/or Microphone. {M0.He}{F0.She} is now able to sing Pop songs by clicking on {M0.himself}{F0.herself} and selecting Sing Song. {0.SimFirstName} can also be romantic with other Sims by serenading them.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} can now sing Country songs and Duet Jazz songs on the Karaoke Machine, and can sing Pop songs via the Piano, Guitar, and/or Microphone. {M0.He}{F0.She} is now able to sing Pop songs by clicking on {M0.himself}{F0.herself} and selecting Sing Song. {0.SimFirstName} can also be romantic with other Sims by serenading them.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName}'s singing voice and karaoke scores are improving all the time. Listen to {M0.him}{F0.her} go!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName}'s singing voice and karaoke scores are improving all the time. Listen to {M0.him}{F0.her} go!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} can now sing Disco songs and Duet Ballad songs on the Karaoke Machine.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} can now sing Disco songs and Duet Ballad songs on the Karaoke Machine.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} can now sing Duet Pop songs with other Sims! {M0.He}{F0.She} can also perform Rock songs on the Karaoke Machine, and Folk songs via the Piano, Guitar, and/or Microphone (requires Piano Skill level 3 and Guitar Skill level 3). {M0.He}{F0.She} is now able to sing Folk songs by clicking on {M0.himself}{F0.herself}. {0.SimFirstName} can also Rave about Favorite Singers to other Sims and Sing in the Shower.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} can now sing Duet Pop songs with other Sims! {M0.He}{F0.She} can also perform Rock songs on the Karaoke Machine, and Folk songs via the Piano, Guitar, and/or Microphone (requires Piano Skill level 3 and Guitar Skill level 3). {M0.He}{F0.She} is now able to sing Folk songs by clicking on {M0.himself}{F0.herself}. {0.SimFirstName} can also Rave about Favorite Singers to other Sims and Sing in the Shower.

String.Source:
{0.SimFirstName} can now Write Lyrics by clicking on the Microphone, Guitar, or Piano. In order to Write Lyrics using the Guitar or Piano, {M0.he}{F0.she} will require Piano Skill level 3 or Guitar Skill level 3 at a minimum.
{0.SimFirstName} can also sing completed written lyrics via the Guitar, Piano, Microphone, and/or by clicking on {M0.himself}{F0.herself}.
String.Dest:
{0.SimFirstName} can now Write Lyrics by clicking on the Microphone, Guitar, or Piano. In order to Write Lyrics using the Guitar or Piano, {M0.he}{F0.she} will require Piano Skill level 3 or Guitar Skill level 3 at a minimum.
{0.SimFirstName} can also sing completed written lyrics via the Guitar, Piano, Microphone, and/or by clicking on {M0.himself}{F0.herself}.

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} can now sing Theater Drama songs on the Microphone, Guitar, and Piano, or by selecting {M0.him}{F0.her}self!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} can now sing Theater Drama songs on the Microphone, Guitar, and Piano, or by selecting {M0.him}{F0.her}self!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} can now License Lyrics that {M0.he}{F0.she} has written (at the mailbox)!
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} can now License Lyrics that {M0.he}{F0.she} has written (at the mailbox)!

String.Source: {0.SimFirstName} acquired the Singing Skill! {0.SimFirstName} can improve {M0.his}{F0.her} skill by clicking on a Microphone or on {M0.himself}{F0.herself} and then selecting Practice Singing. {M0.He}{F0.She} can now select Sing Solo for House, Jazz, and Pop songs, and can sing Country by selecting Sing Duet using the Karaoke Machine.
String.Dest: {0.SimFirstName} acquired the Singing Skill! {0.SimFirstName} can improve {M0.his}{F0.her} skill by clicking on a Microphone or on {M0.himself}{F0.herself} and then selecting Practice Singing. {M0.He}{F0.She} can now select Sing Solo for House, Jazz, and Pop songs, and can sing Country by selecting Sing Duet using the Karaoke Machine.

String.Source:
While any Sim can sing, can they sing well? Sims with the Singing Skill love to belt it, no matter where they are at.
Sims love to sing using the Karaoke Machine, but they can also sing using instruments or the Microphone. Skilled singers will unlock more songs, have the ability to Sing in Shower, and serenade other Sims. High skilled singers can write lyrics on instruments and even license lyrics to earn a few more Simoleons!
String.Dest:
While any Sim can sing, can they sing well? Sims with the Singing Skill love to belt it, no matter where they are at.
Sims love to sing using the Karaoke Machine, but they can also sing using instruments or the Microphone. Skilled singers will unlock more songs, have the ability to Sing in Shower, and serenade other Sims. High skilled singers can write lyrics on instruments and even license lyrics to earn a few more Simoleons!

String.Source: Use your political prowess for the greater good. Raise money and fund a solution for the cause you support!
String.Dest: Use your political prowess for the greater good. Raise money and fund a solution for the cause you support!

String.Source: Everyone has an opinion. But not everyone is paid to have it! Whether it’s the foods or the arts, you'll have something to say about it, and others WILL listen.
String.Dest: Everyone has an opinion. But not everyone is paid to have it! Whether it’s the foods or the arts, you'll have something to say about it, and others WILL listen.

String.Source: What’s trending? Where’s the best food in town? Who’s the most interesting celebrity? As a social media magnate, you'll answer these questions and more for your followers.
String.Dest: What’s trending? Where’s the best food in town? Who’s the most interesting celebrity? As a social media magnate, you'll answer these questions and more for your followers.

String.Source: While any Sim can claim that they can sing, you're always pitch perfect. You'll love to belt out a song on a karaoke machine, in the shower, or anywhere else you find yourself.
String.Dest: While any Sim can claim that they can sing, you're always pitch perfect. You'll love to belt out a song on a karaoke machine, in the shower, or anywhere else you find yourself.

String.Source: Leveraging their status in the art world, Critically Connected Sims receive a 20% rebate on all Art purchased in Build Mode each week. Rebates will be applied directly to Household Funds.
String.Dest: Leveraging their status in the art world, Critically Connected Sims receive a 20% rebate on all Art purchased in Build Mode each week. Rebates will be applied directly to Household Funds.

String.Source: Sims who are In the Know can get a massive discount on market stall purchases if they Haggle with vendors.
String.Dest: Sims who are In the Know can get a massive discount on market stall purchases if they Haggle with vendors.

String.Source: Spice Hounds never find any food too Spicy, and feel Happy for hours after eating a Spicy Meal.
String.Dest: Spice Hounds never find any food too Spicy, and feel Happy for hours after eating a Spicy Meal.

String.Source: These Sims get Tense around Flirty Sims and seldom get Flirty themselves. It's difficult for them to be Romantic in public.
String.Dest: These Sims get Tense around Flirty Sims and seldom get Flirty themselves. It's difficult for them to be Romantic in public.

String.Source:
Fashion District
The hip, neon Fashion District is the heart of the city’s nightlife and is blanketed in billboards.
Complete with a hopping Karaoke Bar, this is the choice spot for some of San Myshuno’s freshest young scenesters to live and get noticed.
Channel your inner hacker and visit here to catch GeekCon or scope out the local dating scene at the Romance Festival.
String.Dest:
Fashion District
The hip, neon Fashion District is the heart of the city’s nightlife and is blanketed in billboards.
Complete with a hopping Karaoke Bar, this is the choice spot for some of San Myshuno’s freshest young scenesters to live and get noticed.
Channel your inner hacker and visit here to catch GeekCon or scope out the local dating scene at the Romance Festival.

String.Source:
Myshuno Meadows
A nature-filled getaway preserved in the middle of the city and hugged by skyscrapers, Myshuno Meadows is a great place for a relaxed wedding or an outdoor birthday party. Centered on a historic old observatory, the garden has been converted into a peaceful events space.
Other points of interest in the surrounding park include weaving jogging paths, a collection of historical plaques to learn about the city, a swan-filled lake for fishing, a playground, a food cart area, and a weekend picnic spot.
String.Dest:
Myshuno Meadows
A nature-filled getaway preserved in the middle of the city and hugged by skyscrapers, Myshuno Meadows is a great place for a relaxed wedding or an outdoor birthday party. Centered on a historic old observatory, the garden has been converted into a peaceful events space.
Other points of interest in the surrounding park include weaving jogging paths, a collection of historical plaques to learn about the city, a swan-filled lake for fishing, a playground, a food cart area, and a weekend picnic spot.

String.Source:
Arts Quarter
Looks like someone spilled a bottle of boho! Aspiring musicians and painters alike flock to the Arts Quarter because this colorful and free-spirited neighborhood is the perfect environment to inspire their creativity.
The abundance of bubble blowers doesn’t hurt either.
The Arts Quarter’s central plaza is the setting for the Humor and Hijinks Festival where picturesque fireworks paint the city sky.
String.Dest:
Arts Quarter
Looks like someone spilled a bottle of boho! Aspiring musicians and painters alike flock to the Arts Quarter because this colorful and free-spirited neighborhood is the perfect environment to inspire their creativity.
The abundance of bubble blowers doesn’t hurt either.
The Arts Quarter’s central plaza is the setting for the Humor and Hijinks Festival where picturesque fireworks paint the city sky.

String.Source:
Uptown
If you’re living in Uptown, you’re living luxe.
Uptown is San Myshuno’s swankiest neighborhood that floats up in the clouds. The wealthy and the famous alike can call this neighborhood in the sky their home.
From any apartment in Uptown, you get a full view of the city and you might even catch glimpse of a helicopter taking off!
Start your morning off with shooting some hoops at the Gym and finish off your perfect day with an evening drift in the Stargazer Lounge's pool.
String.Dest:
Uptown
If you’re living in Uptown, you’re living luxe.
Uptown is San Myshuno’s swankiest neighborhood that floats up in the clouds. The wealthy and the famous alike can call this neighborhood in the sky their home.
From any apartment in Uptown, you get a full view of the city and you might even catch glimpse of a helicopter taking off!
Start your morning off with shooting some hoops at the Gym and finish off your perfect day with an evening drift in the Stargazer Lounge's pool.

String.Source:
Spice Market
Reminiscent of one of those classic brownstone neighborhoods we all recognize from old cop shows, the dockside Spice Market is great for families and for Sims starting a fresh new life in the city.
Live here for the close community vibe and children’s play areas just steps away from the front door. Visit here for the Spice Festival and the Flea Market.
String.Dest:
Spice Market
Reminiscent of one of those classic brownstone neighborhoods we all recognize from old cop shows, the dockside Spice Market is great for families and for Sims starting a fresh new life in the city.
Live here for the close community vibe and children’s play areas just steps away from the front door. Visit here for the Spice Festival and the Flea Market.

String.Source:
The GeekCon can be found in the Fashion District. Festival Activities:
  • Participate in the Hackathon for great prizes.
  • While you are attending the festival you will have increased skill gain.
  • Participate in the Ultimate Gaming Test for a chance to win prizes.
  • Travel to the stars with our rocket tours.
  • Experience space travel without the hassle of building the rocket.
String.Dest:
The GeekCon can be found in the Fashion District. Festival Activities:
  • Participate in the Hackathon for great prizes.
  • While you are attending the festival you will have increased skill gain.
  • Participate in the Ultimate Gaming Test for a chance to win prizes.
  • Travel to the stars with our rocket tours.
  • Experience space travel without the hassle of building the rocket.

String.Source:
Apartments have elevators, trash chute and mailboxes to assist Sims in everyday apartment living. Elevators are the most important since you can use it to go downstairs and travel. When out in the neighborhood you can click on your apartment to go back upstairs or visit a friend too.
If you want to live life unrestricted and build with more freedom, try a penthouse!
String.Dest:
Apartments have elevators, trash chute and mailboxes to assist Sims in everyday apartment living. Elevators are the most important since you can use it to go downstairs and travel. When out in the neighborhood you can click on your apartment to go back upstairs or visit a friend too.
If you want to live life unrestricted and build with more freedom, try a penthouse!

String.Source: Some apartments have traits assigned to them. Traits provide unique gameplay opportunities. Customize your traits for positive and negative effects on your Sims. Beware some traits are locked and cannot be removed (not always a bad thing). Get creative and try them all!
String.Dest: Some apartments have traits assigned to them. Traits provide unique gameplay opportunities. Customize your traits for positive and negative effects on your Sims. Beware some traits are locked and cannot be removed (not always a bad thing). Get creative and try them all!

String.Source: In City Living, Sims can now enjoy tighter knit living experiences with Apartments. Sims not only will enjoy bonding and creating long lasting relationships with their neighbors or even gain some enemies. Neighbors with different traits will add an element of surprise and community to your shared space. Flirty Sims may come over for a shower… and loner Sims you may just never see them! Meet a new BFF? You can now give them a key to your place so they can come and hang out whenever they are free! Change your mind? You can totally ask for it back. The stories and relationships will have endless possibilities.
String.Dest: In City Living, Sims can now enjoy tighter knit living experiences with Apartments. Sims not only will enjoy bonding and creating long lasting relationships with their neighbors or even gain some enemies. Neighbors with different traits will add an element of surprise and community to your shared space. Flirty Sims may come over for a shower… and loner Sims you may just never see them! Meet a new BFF? You can now give them a key to your place so they can come and hang out whenever they are free! Change your mind? You can totally ask for it back. The stories and relationships will have endless possibilities.

String.Source: Some apartments, typically cheaper ones, come with their own problems. Utility boxes may not be wired correctly or there's just a strange, random odor. Being around problems can make Sims miserable. Sims can use their Handiness Skill to fix them, but if they aren't handy enough, they can ask the Landlord to help. Better make your Sims have a friendly relationship and pay their rent on time! Apartment's problems are built into the apartment and cannot be removed in Build Mode.
String.Dest: Some apartments, typically cheaper ones, come with their own problems. Utility boxes may not be wired correctly or there's just a strange, random odor. Being around problems can make Sims miserable. Sims can use their Handiness Skill to fix them, but if they aren't handy enough, they can ask the Landlord to help. Better make your Sims have a friendly relationship and pay their rent on time! Apartment's problems are built into the apartment and cannot be removed in Build Mode.

String.Source: You can choose to Work From Home in a number of ways. About an hour before work starts, a small alarm will go off above your Sim’s skewer. Select that Sim to see your options to either Go To Work, Work From Home, or Take the Day Off. If you happen to miss the alarm notification or just want to plan out your day in advance, the option to Work From Home can also be found in your Phone Menu. If your Sim has already gone to work onsite, you’ll need to wait until the next work day if you want them to Work From Home.
String.Dest: You can choose to Work From Home in a number of ways. About an hour before work starts, a small alarm will go off above your Sim’s skewer. Select that Sim to see your options to either Go To Work, Work From Home, or Take the Day Off. If you happen to miss the alarm notification or just want to plan out your day in advance, the option to Work From Home can also be found in your Phone Menu. If your Sim has already gone to work onsite, you’ll need to wait until the next work day if you want them to Work From Home.

String.Source: If you choose to Work From Home, you’ll immediately get two randomized tasks for the day in your Career Panel. Now here’s the beauty: you can do those tasks at your leisure! Successfully completing the tasks before your next work day will give you points toward your career progress and you’ll get paid out at the end of the day. The best thing about Working From Home is that it gives your Sim a reason to get out of their apartment and go explore the different Festivals, different locations, and different people of the city that you may not have otherwise known exist!
String.Dest: If you choose to Work From Home, you’ll immediately get two randomized tasks for the day in your Career Panel. Now here’s the beauty: you can do those tasks at your leisure! Successfully completing the tasks before your next work day will give you points toward your career progress and you’ll get paid out at the end of the day. The best thing about Working From Home is that it gives your Sim a reason to get out of their apartment and go explore the different Festivals, different locations, and different people of the city that you may not have otherwise known exist!

String.Source: For the Politician, Social Media, and Critic careers, we’ve added the option for your Sims to Work From Home! This allows you to have a more active role in gaining your Sim career points without sending them away. It also brings your Sims opportunities to get out and explore all the new experiences San Myshuno has to offer.
String.Dest: For the Politician, Social Media, and Critic careers, we’ve added the option for your Sims to Work From Home! This allows you to have a more active role in gaining your Sim career points without sending them away. It also brings your Sims opportunities to get out and explore all the new experiences San Myshuno has to offer.

String.Source: Some food is spicy! New food to City Living can be spicy, but so are some of your old favorites. Sims will learn to like spicy food if they eat enough of it.
String.Dest: Some food is spicy! New food to City Living can be spicy, but so are some of your old favorites. Sims will learn to like spicy food if they eat enough of it.

String.Source: Some food requires your Sim to use Chopsticks. Your Sim will not be good at eating with chopsticks at first, but practice makes perfect.
String.Dest: Some food requires your Sim to use Chopsticks. Your Sim will not be good at eating with chopsticks at first, but practice makes perfect.

String.Source: Sims can have the Vegetarian trait, so there are many vegetarian options for them. Sims who are vegetarian may get sick or sad from eating meat.
String.Dest: Sims can have the Vegetarian trait, so there are many vegetarian options for them. Sims who are vegetarian may get sick or sad from eating meat.

String.Source: Try the Pufferfish Nigiri at your own risk! If it isn't cooked right, Sims might die from eating it.
String.Dest: Try the Pufferfish Nigiri at your own risk! If it isn't cooked right, Sims might die from eating it.

String.Source: City Living has a ton of new food to try! Try new foods at the Food Stalls around the city.
String.Dest: City Living has a ton of new food to try! Try new foods at the Food Stalls around the city.

String.Source: There are 27 new foods to try in City Living. Eating each dish will allow you to learn how to cook it, but Cooking Skill will determine the quality of the recipes. Explore the city and festivals to learn each recipe.
String.Dest: There are 27 new foods to try in City Living. Eating each dish will allow you to learn how to cook it, but Cooking Skill will determine the quality of the recipes. Explore the city and festivals to learn each recipe.

String.Source:
The Flea Market can be found in the Spice Market. Festival Activities:
  • Shop for unique items that can only be found here.
  • Set up a shop and sell your own collectibles.
  • Find Snow Globes and Posters.
  • Trade your collectibles with other festival goers.
String.Dest:
The Flea Market can be found in the Spice Market. Festival Activities:
  • Shop for unique items that can only be found here.
  • Set up a shop and sell your own collectibles.
  • Find Snow Globes and Posters.
  • Trade your collectibles with other festival goers.

String.Source: There are so many signs and advertisements around the city; however, the ones that will give you the most information are the Dynamic Signs. When a festival is going on, the Dynamic Signs will display a special effect and switch to a unique poster that will allow you to read about the festival that is about to start.
String.Dest: There are so many signs and advertisements around the city; however, the ones that will give you the most information are the Dynamic Signs. When a festival is going on, the Dynamic Signs will display a special effect and switch to a unique poster that will allow you to read about the festival that is about to start.

String.Source:
In City Living there are 5 Festivals. These are all new player opportunities that will happen in various town squares around the city. Be sure to check them all out…
  • Spice Festival - Spice Market
  • Flea Market - Spice Market
  • Romance Festival - Fashion District
  • GeekCon - Fashion District
  • Humor and Hijinks Festival - Arts Quarter
String.Dest:
In City Living there are 5 Festivals. These are all new player opportunities that will happen in various town squares around the city. Be sure to check them all out…
  • Spice Festival - Spice Market
  • Flea Market - Spice Market
  • Romance Festival - Fashion District
  • GeekCon - Fashion District
  • Humor and Hijinks Festival - Arts Quarter

String.Source:
When a festival starts and it is at your current location, you will be able to join in the fun by walking out to the neighborhood square. If it is in a different neighborhood, you can get to it a few ways:
Click the TNS and select the option to travel.
Click on any dynamic sign in the world. They are the signs that will be glowing!
String.Dest:
When a festival starts and it is at your current location, you will be able to join in the fun by walking out to the neighborhood square. If it is in a different neighborhood, you can get to it a few ways:
Click the TNS and select the option to travel.
Click on any dynamic sign in the world. They are the signs that will be glowing!

String.Source:
The Spice Festival can be found in the Spice Market. Festival Activities:
  • Enjoy local cuisine from various cultures.
  • Harvest fresh fruits and vegetables that are constantly changing.
  • Take the Spicy Curry Challenge for a chance to win a special T-Shirt.
  • Purchase unique spices from the local Swag Stall.
String.Dest:
The Spice Festival can be found in the Spice Market. Festival Activities:
  • Enjoy local cuisine from various cultures.
  • Harvest fresh fruits and vegetables that are constantly changing.
  • Take the Spicy Curry Challenge for a chance to win a special T-Shirt.
  • Purchase unique spices from the local Swag Stall.

String.Source:
The Humor and Hijinks Festival can be found in the Arts Quarter. Festival Activities:
  • Participate in the Pranksters and Jokesters Challenge.
  • Light up the sky with fireworks.
  • Perform stand up comedy routines.
  • Perform devilish voodoo on unsuspecting festival goers.
String.Dest:
The Humor and Hijinks Festival can be found in the Arts Quarter. Festival Activities:
  • Participate in the Pranksters and Jokesters Challenge.
  • Light up the sky with fireworks.
  • Perform stand up comedy routines.
  • Perform devilish voodoo on unsuspecting festival goers.

String.Source:
The Romance Festival can be found in the Fashion District. Festival Activities:
  • Drink Sakura Tea to put you in the perfect mood.
  • Celebrate the beauty of Romance by scattering flower petals.
  • Have a heat of the moment proposal.
  • Ask the Romance Guru for the ultimate love advice.
String.Dest:
The Romance Festival can be found in the Fashion District. Festival Activities:
  • Drink Sakura Tea to put you in the perfect mood.
  • Celebrate the beauty of Romance by scattering flower petals.
  • Have a heat of the moment proposal.
  • Ask the Romance Guru for the ultimate love advice.

String.Source: Sims can sing on objects such as the Karaoke Machine, the Microphone, Piano, or Guitar.
String.Dest: Sims can sing on objects such as the Karaoke Machine, the Microphone, Piano, or Guitar.

String.Source: Sims with a higher Singing Skill will sing and perform much better, especially on the Karaoke Machine. They can also serenade other Sims, Sing in Shower, and license written lyrics on instruments.
String.Dest: Sims with a higher Singing Skill will sing and perform much better, especially on the Karaoke Machine. They can also serenade other Sims, Sing in Shower, and license written lyrics on instruments.

String.Source: City Living introduces the new Singing Skill for Sims. You can click on your Sims or certain musical objects, like the Karaoke Machine, to have them sing.
String.Dest: City Living introduces the new Singing Skill for Sims. You can click on your Sims or certain musical objects, like the Karaoke Machine, to have them sing.

String.Source:
Welcome to San Myshuno! This city is made up of four distinct districts: the Spice Market, the Fashion District, The Arts Quarter and Uptown.
In addition, Myshuno Meadows is a large city park tucked beneath the skyscrapers if your Sims need to get away for a touch of nature.
Depending on where your Sims choose to live, you’ll get a very different flavor of the city. You might find yourself in a cramped, roach-infested studio apartment in the Arts Quarter… Or you might be enjoying a breathtaking view of the city from your very own tricked-out rooftop penthouse Jacuzzi in Uptown.
String.Dest:
Welcome to San Myshuno! This city is made up of four distinct districts: the Spice Market, the Fashion District, The Arts Quarter and Uptown.
In addition, Myshuno Meadows is a large city park tucked beneath the skyscrapers if your Sims need to get away for a touch of nature.
Depending on where your Sims choose to live, you’ll get a very different flavor of the city. You might find yourself in a cramped, roach-infested studio apartment in the Arts Quarter… Or you might be enjoying a breathtaking view of the city from your very own tricked-out rooftop penthouse Jacuzzi in Uptown.

String.Source: I hear the Arts Center has some interesting activities! Want to come with me to check it out?
String.Dest: I hear the Arts Center has some interesting activities! Want to come with me to check it out?

String.Source: The Arts Center is a great place to hang out and do creative activities and have Mentors improve your Sims skills.
String.Dest: The Arts Center is a great place to hang out and do creative activities and have Mentors improve your Sims skills.

String.Source: Want to sing some tunes with me at the Karaoke bar? You will have fun, I promise!
String.Dest: Want to sing some tunes with me at the Karaoke bar? You will have fun, I promise!

String.Source: The Karaoke Bar is a great place to unwind and sing some of your favorite songs.
String.Dest: The Karaoke Bar is a great place to unwind and sing some of your favorite songs.

String.Source: The flowers are always in bloom at Myshuno Meadows. Let’s go and enjoy the gardens.
String.Dest: The flowers are always in bloom at Myshuno Meadows. Let’s go and enjoy the gardens.

String.Source: The water is so calm and relaxing at Myshuno Meadows. Come join us!
String.Dest: The water is so calm and relaxing at Myshuno Meadows. Come join us!

String.Source: Feeling thirsty? Let’s grab a drink at the Myshuno Meadows outdoor bar.
String.Dest: Feeling thirsty? Let’s grab a drink at the Myshuno Meadows outdoor bar.

String.Source: Surrounded by fine old trees, Myshuno Meadows is a great place for a relaxed wedding or outdoor Birthday party. Centered on Barnabas Skye's old Observatory, the garden has been converted into an event space while still retaining the original telescope. The management strongly discourages newly married couples from consummating their vows in the Observatory, unfortunately it has become something of a tradition in the city. Myshuno Meadows is noted for its nighttime lighting.
String.Dest: Surrounded by fine old trees, Myshuno Meadows is a great place for a relaxed wedding or outdoor Birthday party. Centered on Barnabas Skye's old Observatory, the garden has been converted into an event space while still retaining the original telescope. The management strongly discourages newly married couples from consummating their vows in the Observatory, unfortunately it has become something of a tradition in the city. Myshuno Meadows is noted for its nighttime lighting.
